original: paṇṇaṃ pahiṇi. Taṃ sutvā rājā mahatiyā senāya parivuto yuddhabhūmiṃ gacchanto mahesiyā
analyzed: tam sutvā rājā mahatiyā senāya parivutaḥ yuddha bhūmim gacchantaḥ mahesiyā

original: saddhiṃ gantvā khandhāvāraṃ nivāsetvā tassā evamāha. Bhadde saṅgāmasīse jayaparājayo

analyzed: nāma na sakkā viññātum sace me parājayaḥ abhavissa puretaram eva ratta patākam ussāpessāmi

original: karonto attano parājayabhāvaṃ ñatvā mātugāmaṃ saritvā rattaddhajaṃ ussāpetvā yujjhanto
analyzed: karontaḥ attanaḥ parājaya bhāvam ñatvā mātugāmam saritvā rattaddhajam ussāpetvā yujjhantaḥ

analyzed: raṇe atha sā ratta patākam disvā parājitaḥ nūna me sāmikā uti bhayena palāyitum ārabhi

original: Atha taṃ corarañño manussā disvā nūnāyaṃ rañño aggamahesīti ñatvā attano rājānaṃ

original: Amaccā taṃ abhisekatthāya yāciṃsu, sā na me bhaṇe abhisekenatthoti na icchi. Amaccā

original: tamatthaṃ rañño ārocesuṃ. Rājā naṃ pakkosāpetvā kasmā na icchasīti pucchi. Sā evamāha.

original: Suṇohi sādhukaṃ deva, bhāsamānāya me vaco;
analyzed: suṇohi sādhukam deva bhāsamānāya me vacaḥ

original: Bhattā mayhaṃ mato ajja, sabbasampattidāyako.
analyzed: bhattā mayham mataḥ ajja sabba sampatti dāyakaḥ

original: Katvāna sobhisekaṃ maṃ, attano hadayaṃ viya;
analyzed: katvāna sobhisekam mam attana hadayam viya

original: Pāleti taṃ sarantassā, sokaggi dahate manaṃ.
analyzed: pāla iti tam sarantassa sokaggi dahate manam

original: Mahārāja sacaññassa, assa maggamahesikā;
analyzed: mahā rāja sacaññassa assa maggamahesikā

original: Tamhā dukkhā na muccāmi, tenāhaṃ taṃ na patthaye.
analyzed: tamhā dukkhā na muccāmi tena aham tam na patthaye

original: Sokagginā padittāhaṃ, soke sokaṃ kathaṃ khipe;
analyzed: sokagginā padittā aham soke sokam katham khipe

original: Jalantaggimhī ko nāma, palālaṃ pakkhipe budho.

analyzed: piya vippayoga dukkham tam cintayantī punappunam

original: Tamhā dukkhā na muccāmi, tasmāhaṃ taṃ na patthayeti.
analyzed: tamhā dukkhā na muccāmi tasmā aham tam na patthaya iti

original: Atha sā yācantī rājānaṃ āha.
analyzed: atha sā yācantī rājānam āha

original: Pāpo nippāpinaṃ rāja, pātanaṃ khalu pāvake;

original: Hoti pāpaphalaṃ tassa, paccatteca paratthaca.
analyzed: hoti pāpa phalam tassa paccatte ca parattha ca

original: Purātanehi bhūpāla, samaṇabrahmaṇesuca;
analyzed: purātanehi bhūpāla

original: Mātāpitusu bālesu, rogenā turaitthisu;
analyzed: mātā pitusu bālesu rogena tura aitthisu

analyzed: na ppasatthaḥ vadhaḥ deva tasmā aham na vadha arahā ati

original: Mātā pitāca ñātīca, parivārāca sohadā;
analyzed: mātā pitāca ñātīca parivārāca sohadā

analyzed: mantaḥ sadhā dayaḥ ca api mahesakkhāḥ ca devatā

analyzed: rakkhitum nā iva sakkonti hitvāna saraṇattayam

original: Tena tejena maṃ rāja, jalanto aggi no dahi.

original: Tena tejena maṃ rāja, jalanto aggi no dahi.
analyzed: tena tejena mam rāja jalantaḥ aggi naḥ dahi

original: Tena tejena maṃ rāja, jalanto aggi no dahi.

original: Iminā me adhikārena, pasādena yatissare;

original: mahārājāno kinnukho mahārāja ukkaṇṭhitoti pucchiṃsu. Imamhā devalokā katarannu kho

original: vūpasami, tasmā nāgatosmīti vutte sā sādhu bhanteti somanassajātā gehameva agamāsi.
analyzed: tasmā na āgataḥ asmi iti vutte sā sādhu bhante iti somanassa jātā geham eva agamāsi

original: Sā tena puññakammena kālaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatti. Tassā tattha dvādasayojanikaṃ
analyzed: sā tena puñña kammena kālam katvā deva loke nibbatti tassā tattha dvādasa yojanikam

original: kanakavimānaṃ nibbatti. Sā tattha devissariyaṃ anubhavantī chabuddhantaraṃ khepetvā

original: amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle jambudīpe devaputtanagare udiccabrahmaṇakule jeṭṭhabrāhmaṇassa

original: bhariyāya kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi, sā paripāka manvāya mātukucchito nikkhami.
analyzed: bhariyāya kucchimhi paṭisandhim gaṇhi sā mātukucchitaḥ nikkhami

original: Tassā mātukucchito nikkhantakālato paṭṭhāya divase divase aṭṭhaṭṭhanālimattaṃ taṇḍulaṃ

analyzed: nibbattati tassāḥ rūpa sampattim disvā pasannāḥ mātā pitaraḥ rūpadevī iti nāma makaṃsu

original: Pacchā taṃ patirūpena dārakena niyojesuṃ. Athassā taṇḍula- nālimattaṃ gahetvā pacituṃ
analyzed: pacchā tam pati rūpena dārakena niyojesuṃ athassā taṇḍula nāli mattam gahetvā pacituṃ

original: Yannūnāhaṃ assā pakāseyyanti ekadivasaṃ tassā nivesane bhuñjitvā anumodanaṃ karonto
analyzed: yat nūna aham assā pakāseyyanti eka divasam tassāḥ nivesane bhuñjitvā anumodanam karontaḥ

analyzed: athassā so pubba kammam pakāsento

original: Ekanavute ito kappe,
analyzed: ekanavute itas kappe

original: Vipassīnāma nāyako;
analyzed: vipassī nāma nāyako

original: Ahosi loke lokeka,
analyzed: ahosi loke lokeka

original: Nāyako chinnabandhano.
analyzed: nāyako chinna bandhanaḥ

original: Tadā tasmiṃ pure ramme, āsi tvaṃ gāmadārikā;
analyzed: tadā tasmin pure ramme āsi tvam gāma dārikā

original: Āhiṇḍantī vihārasmiṃ, addakkhi jinasāvakaṃ.
analyzed: āhiṇḍantī vihārasmiṃ addakkhi jina sāvakam

original: Rogāturaṃ kisaṃ paṇḍuṃ, assasantaṃ muhuṃ muhuṃ;
analyzed: roga āturam kisam paṇḍum assasantam muhum muhum

original: Disvāna kampitā cittā, nimantetvāna taṃ muniṃ.
analyzed: disvāna kampitā cittā nimantetvāna tam munim

original: Bhesajjañceva bhattañca, adā tvaṃ tena so yati;
analyzed: bhesajjam ca iva bhattam ca adāḥ tvam tena saḥ yati

original: Abyābādho anīghoca, ahosi anupaddavo.
analyzed: a byābādhaḥ anīghoca ahosi an upaddavaḥ

original: Tato tvaṃ tena kammena, sukatena tato cutā;

analyzed: jātā asi deva lokasmim sabba kāma samiddhinī

original: Tattha te puññatejena, pāsādo ratanāmayo;

original: Nekagabbhasatākiṇṇo, sayanāsanamaṇḍito;

original: Accharāsatasaṃkiṇṇo, naccagītādisaṃkulo.
analyzed: accharāsata saṃkiṇṇaḥ nacca gīta ādi saṃkulaḥ

original: Rambhāmbajambusannīra, pūgapunnāgapāṭalī;
Nāgāditarusaṇḍehi, maṇḍituyyānapantihi.
analyzed: nāga ādi taru saṇḍehi

original: Padumuppalakaḷāra, kundakānanamaṇḍite;
analyzed: kunda kānana maṇḍite

original: Madhumattālipālīhi, sārasīsarasaṃkule.

original: Devaputtehi nekehi, tathā devaccharāhica;

original: Niccussave mahābhoge, vimāne mananandane.
analyzed: niccussave mahā bhoge vimāne mana nandane

original: Tvamevaṃ devalokamhi, vindamānā mahāyasaṃ;

original: Adā dānaṃ gilānassa, tassa taṃ phalamīdisaṃ.

original: Iti taruṇakumārī puññakammesu sāraṃ,

analyzed: nandiya rājassa vatthumhi ayam ānupubbī kathā

analyzed: kālam katvā tāvatiṃsa bhavane nibbattitvā tattha yāvatāyukam dibba sampattim anubhavitvā

original: tato cavitvā bārāṇasito tiyojanamattake ṭhāne aññatarasmiṃ nagare nibbatti, tassa
analyzed: tatas cavitvā bārāṇasito ti yojana mattake ṭhāne aññatarasmim nagare nibbatti tassa

original: mātāpitaro nandiyoti nandītināmaṃ itisabbattha nāmaṃ akaṃsu, tassa satta bhātaro
analyzed: mātā pitaraḥ nandiyo ti nandī iti nāmam iti sabbattha nāmam akaṃsu tassa satta bhātaro

original: ahesuṃ, sesā cha bhātaro nānākammantesu byāvaṭā mātāpitunnaṃ posenti. Nandiyo pana
analyzed: ahesum sesā cha bhātaraḥ nānā kammantesu byāvaṭāḥ mātā pitunnam posenti pana

original: akammasīlo geheyeva vasati. Tasmā tassa sesā kujjhanti. Mātāpitaropi nandiyaṃ āmantetvā
analyzed: a kamma sīlaḥ geheya iva vasati tasmā tassa sesā kujjhanti mātā pitaraḥ api nandiyam āmantetvā

original: ovadanti. So tuṇhī hoteva. Athāparasmiṃ samaye gāme nakkhattaṃ saṅghuṭṭhaṃ, tadā
analyzed: ovadanti saḥ tuṇhī hotā iva atha aparasmin samaye gāme nakkhattam saṅghuṭṭham tadā

original: so mātaraṃ āha. Amma sāṭakaṃ dehi, nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmīti, sā dhota- vatthaṃ nīharitvā
analyzed: saḥ mātaram āha amma sāṭakam dehi nakkhattam kīḷissāmi iti sā dhota vattham nīharitvā

original: adāsi, amma thūlaṃ idanti, sā aññaṃ nīharitvā adāsi, tampi paṭikkhipi. Atha naṃ mātā
analyzed: adāsi amma thūlam idan ti sā aññam nīharitvā adāsi tam pi paṭikkhipi atha nam mātā

original: āha. Tāta yādise mayaṃ gehe jātā, natthi ito sukhumatarassa paṭilābhāya puññanti,
analyzed: āha tāta yādise mayam gehe jātā natthi itas sukhumatarassa paṭilābhāya

original: labhanaṭṭhānaṃ gamissāmi ammāti. Putta ahaṃ ajjeva tava bārāṇasīnagare rajjapaṭilābhaṃ
analyzed: labhana ṭṭhānam gamissāmi ammāti putta aham ajjā iva tava bārāṇasī nagare rajja paṭilābham

original: icchāmīti āha. So sādhu ammāti mātaraṃ vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi. Mātuyā
analyzed: icchāmi iti āha saḥ sādhu ammā ati mātaram vanditvā padakkhiṇam katvā pakkāmi mātuyā

original: panassa evaṃ ahosi. Kahaṃ so gamissati, pubbeviya idhavā etthavā gehe nisīditvā āgacchatīti,
analyzed: panassa evam ahosi kaham so gamissati pubbeviya idhavā etthavā gehe nisīditvā āgacchati iti

original: so pana puññaniyāmena codiyamāno gāmato nikkhamitvā bārāṇasiṃ gantvā senaguttassa
analyzed: so pana puñña niyāmena codiyamānaḥ gāmataḥ nikkhamitvā bārāṇasim gantvā senaguttassa

original: gehe paṭivasati, athekadivasaṃ so tassa kammakārehi saddhiṃ sallapanto nisīditvā
analyzed: gehe paṭivasati atha eka divasam saḥ tassa kammakārehi saddhim sallapantaḥ nisīditvā

original: pacalāyanto supinaṃ addasa. Mukhena antaṃ nikkhamitvā sakalajambudīpe pattharitvā
analyzed: pacalāyantaḥ supinam addasa mukhena antam nikkhamitvā sakala jambudīpe pattharitvā

original: antokucchimeva pāvisi. Pabuddho so bhīto mahāsaddamakāsi. Atha naṃ mahāsenagutto
analyzed: antokucchim eva pāvisi pabuddhaḥ saḥ bhītaḥ mahā saddam akāsi atha nam mahāsena gutto

original: pucchi. Nandiyo supinaṃ addasanti āha. Atha tena kīdisanti puṭṭho kathesi, tato senagutto
analyzed: pucchi nandiyaḥ supinam addasanti āha atha tena kīdisanti puṭṭho kathesi tato senagutto

original: taṃ attano kulūpagaṃ paribbājikaṃ pucchi ko tassa vipākoti. Paribbājikā yadi bho
analyzed: tam attanaḥ kula upagam paribbājikam pucchi kaḥ tassa vipākaḥ ti paribbājikā yadi bho

original: itthī passati. Sattadivasabbhantareyeva abhisekaṃ labhati, yadi puriso passati, tatheva
analyzed: itthī passati abhisekam labhati yadi puriso passati tathā iva

original: rājā hotīti kathesi. Senagutto tassā taṃ kathaṃ sutvā imaṃ mama ñātiṃ karomīti attano
analyzed: rājā hoti iti kathesi senagutto tassā tam katham sutvā imam mama ñātim karomi iti attanaḥ

original: satta dhītare pakkositvā paṭipāṭiyā pucchi. Nandiyassa santike vasathāti, sesā sabbā
analyzed: satta dhītare pakkositvā paṭipāṭiyā pucchi nandiyassa santike vasatha ati sesā sabbā

original: na icchiṃsu, na mayaṃ jānāma etaṃ adhunāgataṃ kulavantaṃ vā dukkulavantaṃvāti. Atha
analyzed: na icchiṃsu na mayam jānāmaḥ etam adhunā āgatam kulavantam vā dukkulavantam vā ati atha

original: kaṇiṭṭhikaṃ pucchi. Sā yassa maṃ mātāpitaro dassanti. Tesaṃ vacanaṃ na bhindissāmīti
analyzed: kaṇiṭṭhikam pucchi sā yassa mam mātā pitaraḥ dassanti tesam vacanam na bhindissāmi iti

original: sampaṭicchi, atha senagutto nandiyaṃ pakkositvā attano dhītaraṃ datvā tassa mahāsampatti
analyzed: sampaṭicchi atha senaguttaḥ nandiyam pakkositvā attanaḥ dhītaram da tvā tassa mahā sampatti

original: madāsi. Tato sattame divase nandiyo tattha tattha āhiṇḍanto rañño maṅgaluyyānaṃ passissāmīti
analyzed: tatas sattame divase nandiyaḥ tattha tattha āhiṇḍantaḥ raññaḥ maṅgaluyyānam passissāmi iti

original: gantvā dhaṅgalasilāpaṭṭesasīsaṃ pārupitvā nipajji, so ca bārāṇasīrañño kālaṅkatassa
analyzed: gantvā dhaṅgala silā paṭṭesa sīsam pārupitvā nipajji saḥ ca bārāṇasī raññaḥ kālaṅkatassa

original: sattamo divaso hoti. Amaccāca purohitoca rañño sarīrakiccaṃ kāretvā rājaṅgaṇe nisīditvā
analyzed: sattamaḥ divasaḥ hoti amaccā ca purohito ca rañño sarīrakiccam kāretvā rājaṅgaṇe nisīditvā

original: mantayiṃsu. Rañño ekāva dhītā atthi, putto panassa natthi. Arājikaṃ rajjaṃ na tiṭṭhati.
analyzed: mantayiṃsu raññaḥ ekā ava dhītā atthi putto panassa na atthi arājikam rajjam na tiṭṭhati

original: Phussarathaṃ vissajjessāmāti. Te kumudapattavaṇṇe cattāro sindhave yojetvā setacchattapamukhaṃpañcavidharājakakudhabhaṇḍaṃ
analyzed: phussa ratham vissajjessāma ati te kumuda patta vaṇṇe cattāraḥ sindhave yojetvā seta chatta pamukham pañcavidha rāja kakudha bhaṇḍam

original: rathasmiṃyeva ṭhapetvā rathaṃ vissajjetvā pacchato turiyāni paggaṇhāpesuṃ. Ratho
analyzed: rathasmiṃyeva ṭhapetvā ratham vissajjetvā pacchatas turiyāni rathaḥ

original: pācīdvārena nikkhamitvā uyyānābhimukho ahosi. Paricayena uyyānābhimukho gacchati.
analyzed: pācī dvārena nikkhamitvā uyyāna abhimukhaḥ ahosi paricayena uyyāna abhimukhaḥ gacchati

original: Nivattemāti keci āhaṃsu. Purohito mā nivārayitthāti āha. Ratho kumārakaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ
analyzed: nivattema iti keci āhaṃsu purohitaḥ mā nivārayittha ati āha ratho kumārakam padakkhiṇam

original: katvā ārohaṇasajjo hutvā aṭṭhāsi. Purohito pārupaṇakaṇṇaṃ apanetvā pādatalāni olokento
analyzed: katvā ārohaṇa sajjaḥ hutvā aṭṭhāsi purohito pārupaṇa kaṇṇam apanetvā pāda talāni olokento

original: tiṭṭhatu ayaṃ dīpo. Dvisahassadīpa parivāresu catūsu mahādīpesu ekarajjaṃ kātuṃ samatthotivatvā
analyzed: tiṭṭhatu ayam dīpaḥ dvi sahassa dīpa parivāresu catūsu mahā dīpesu eka rajjam kātum samatthaḥ iti vatvā

original: tassa dhitiṃ upadhāretuṃ tikkhattuṃ turiyāni paggaṇhāpesi. Atha kumāro mukhaṃ vivaritvā
analyzed: tassa dhitim upadhāretum tikkhattum turiyāni atha kumāraḥ mukham vivaritvā

original: oloketvā kena kāraṇena āgatatthāti āha, deva tumhākaṃ rajjaṃ pāpuṇātīti, rājā kahanti,
analyzed: oloketvā kena kāraṇena āgatattha ati āha deva tumhākam rajjam pāpuṇāti iti rājā kahanti

original: devattaṃ gato sāmīti, kati divasā atikkantāti, ajja sattamo divasoti. Putto vā dhītā
analyzed: devattam gataḥ sāmi iti kati divasāḥ atikkantā ati ajja sattamaḥ divaso ti puttaḥ vā dhītā

original: vā natthīti, dhītā atthi deva. Putto na vijjatīti, tenahi karissāmi rajjanti, te
analyzed: vā na atthi iti dhītā atthi deva putto na vijjati iti tena hi karissāmi rajjanti te

original: tāvadeva abhisekamaṇḍapaṃ kāretvā rājadhītaraṃ sabbālaṅkārehi alaṅkāritvā uyyānaṃ
analyzed: tāvat eva abhiseka maṇḍapam kāretvā rājadhītaram sabba alaṅkārehi alaṅkāritvā uyyānam

original: netvā kumārassa abhisekaṃ akaṃsu, athassa katābhisekassa satasahassagghanakaṃ vatthaṃ
analyzed: netvā kumārassa abhisekam akaṃsu athassa kata abhisekassa sata sahassa gghanakam vattham

original: ānesuṃ, so kimidaṃ tātāti āha, nivāsanavatthaṃ devāti, nanu tātā thūlaṃti, manussānaṃ
analyzed: ānesum saḥ kim idam tāta ati āha nivāsana vattham deva ati nanu tātā manussānam

original: paribhogavatthesu ito sukhumataraṃ natthi devāti, tumhākaṃ rājā evarūpaṃ nivāsesīti,
analyzed: paribhoga vatthesu itas sukhumataram natthi deva ati tumhākam rājā evarūpam nivāsesi iti

original: āma devāti. Na maññe puññavā tumhākaṃ rājāti vatvā handa suvaṇṇabhiṅkāraṃ āharatha,
analyzed: āma deva ati na maññe puññavā tumhākam rājā ati vatvā handa suvaṇṇa bhiṅkāram āharatha

original: labhissāma vatthanti, te suvaṇṇabhiṅkāraṃ āhariṃsu, so uṭṭhāya hatthe dhovitvā mukhaṃ
analyzed: labhissāma vatthanti te suvaṇṇa bhiṅkāram āhariṃsu saḥ uṭṭhāya hatthe dhovitvā mukham

original: vikkhāletvā hatthena udakaṃ ādāya puratthimadisāya abbhukkiri, tāvadeva ghanapathaviṃ
analyzed: vikkhāletvā hatthena udakam ādāya puratthima disāya tāvat eva ghana pathavim

original: bhinditvā soḷasakapparukkhā uṭṭhahiṃsu, puna udakaṃ hatthena gahetvā dakkhiṇaṃ pacchimaṃ
analyzed: bhinditvā soḷasa kappa rukkhāḥ uṭṭhahiṃsu puna udakam hatthena gahetvā dakkhiṇam pacchimam

original: uttaranti evaṃ catassopi disā abbhukkiri, sabbadisāsu soḷasa soḷasa hutvā catusaṭṭhikapparukkhā
analyzed: uttaranti evam catasso api disāḥ abbhukkiri sabba disāsu soḷasa soḷasa hutvā catur aṭṭhi kappa rukkhā

original: uṭṭhahiṃsu, so ekaṃ dibbadussaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā nandiyarañño vijite suttakantikā
analyzed: uṭṭhahiṃsu saḥ ekam dibbadussam nivāsetvā ekam nandiya raññaḥ vijite sutta kantikā

original: itthiyo mā suttaṃ kantantūti bheriṃ carāpethāti vatvā chattaṃ ussāpetvā alaṅkatapaṭiyatto
analyzed: itthiyaḥ mā suttam kantantu uti bherim carāpetha ati vatvā chattam ussāpetvā alaṅkata paṭiyattaḥ

original: hatthikkhandhavaragato nagaraṃ pavisitvā pāsādamabhiruyha mahāsampattiṃ anubhavi.
analyzed: hatthi khandha vara gataḥ nagaram pavisitvā pāsādam abhiruyha mahā sampattim anubhavi

original: Aho tadā paccekabuddhassa dinnānuvātakassa vipāko. Tenāhu porāṇā.
analyzed: aho tadā paccekabuddhassa dinnānuvātakassa vipāko tena āhu porāṇā

original: Yathā sāsapamattamhā, bījā nigrodhapādapo;
analyzed: yathā

original: Jāyate satasākhaḍḍho, mahānīlambudopamo.
analyzed: jāyate mahā nīla ambuda upamaḥ

original: Tatheva puññakammamhā, aṇumhā vipulaṃ phalaṃ;
analyzed: tathā iva puñña kammamhā aṇumhā vipulam phalam

original: Hotīti appapuññanti, nāvamaññeyya paṇḍitoti.
analyzed: hoti iti na avamaññeyya paṇḍito ti

original: Evaṃ gacchante kāle ekadivasaṃ devī rañño sampattiṃ disvā aho tapassīti kāruññākāraṃ
analyzed: evam gacchante kāle eka divasam devī rañño sampattim disvā aho tapassī iti kāruñña ākāram

original: dassesi. Kimidaṃ devīti ca puṭṭhā atimahatī te deva sampatti. Atītamaddhānaṃ kalyāṇaṃ
analyzed: dassesi kim idam devi iti ca puṭṭhā ati mahatī te deva sampatti atītam addhānam kalyāṇam

original: katattā. Idāni anāgatassatthāya kusalaṃ karothāti āha. Kassa dassāma. Sīlavantā natthīti.
analyzed: kata ttāḥ idāni anāgatassa atthāya kusalam karotha ati āha kassa dassāma sīlavantāḥ na atthi iti

original: Asuñño deva jambudīpo arahantehi, tumhe dānaṃ sajjetha, ahaṃ arahante lacchāmīti
analyzed: asuññaḥ deva jambudīpaḥ arahantehi tumhe dānam sajjetha aham arahante lacchāmi iti

original: āha. Punadivase rājā mahārahaṃ dānaṃ sajjāpesi. Devī sace imissā disāya arahanto
analyzed: āha puna divase rājā mahā raham dānam devī sace imissā disāya arahantaḥ

original: atthi, idhā gantvā amhākaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhantūti uttarahimavantābhimukhī pupphāni uddhaṃ
analyzed: atthi idha gantvā amhākam bhikkham gaṇhantu iti uttara himavanta abhimukhī pupphāni uddhaṃ

original: khipitvā urena nipajji. Atha tāni pupphāni ākāsato gantvā himavantapadese vasantānaṃ
analyzed: khipitvā urena nipajji atha tāni pupphāni ākāsataḥ gantvā himavanta padese vasantānam

original: padumavatiyā puttānaṃ pañcasatānaṃpaccekabuddhānaṃ jeṭṭhakamahāpadumapaccekabuddhassa
analyzed: padumavatiyāḥ puttānam pañca satānam paccekabuddhānam jeṭṭhaka mahāpaduma paccekabuddhassa

original: pādamūle patiṃsu. Tathāhi.
analyzed: pāda mūle patiṃsu tathā hi

original: Aho passatha bho dāni, vimhayaṃ puññakammuno;
analyzed: aho passatha bho dāni vimhayam puñña kammunaḥ

original: Acetanāpi pupphāni, dūtakiccesu byāvaṭā.
analyzed: acetanā api pupphāni dūta kiccesu byāvaṭā

original: Kattukāmena lokasmiṃ, sakalaṃ attano vasaṃ;
analyzed: kattu kāmena lokasmin sakalam vasam

original: Sabbatthāmena kattabbaṃ, puññaṃ paññavatā sadāti.
analyzed: sabbatthāmena kattabbam puññam paññavatā sadā ti

original: Tato mahāpadumapaccekabuddho taṃ ñatvā sesabhātare āmantesi. Mārisā nandiyarājā tumhe
analyzed: tatas mahāpaduma paccekabuddhaḥ tam ñatvā sesa bhātare āmantesi mārisāḥ nandiya rājā tumhe

original: nimantesi. Adhivāsetha tassa nimantananti. Te adhivāsetvā tāvadeva ākāsenā gantvā
analyzed: nimantesi adhivāsetha tassa te adhivāsetvā tāvat eva ākāsena ā gantvā

original: uttaradvāre otariṃsu. Manussā pañcasatā deva paccekabuddhā āgatāti rañño ārocesuṃ,
analyzed: uttara dvāre otariṃsu manussā pañca satā deva paccekabuddhāḥ āgatā ati raññaḥ ārocesuṃ

original: rājā saddhiṃ deviyā gantvā vanditvā patte gahetvā paccekabuddhe pāsādaṃ āropetvā
analyzed: rājā saddhim deviyā gantvā vanditvā patte gahetvā paccekabuddhe pāsādam āropetvā

original: tattha tesaṃ dānaṃ datvā bhattakiccāvasāne rājā saṅghattherassa devī saṅghanavakassa
analyzed: tattha tesam dānam da tvā bhatta kicca avasāne rājā saṅgha ttherassa devī saṅgha navakassa

original: ca pādamūle nipajjitvā ayyā paccayehi na kilamissantu, mayaṃ puññena na hāyissāma,
analyzed: ca pāda mūle nipajjitvā ayyā paccayehi na kilamissantu mayam puññena na hāyissāma

original: amhākaṃ idha vāsāya paṭiññaṃ dethāti paṭiññaṃ kāretvā uyyāne nivāsaṭṭhānādayo kāretvā
analyzed: amhākam idha vāsāya paṭiññam detha iti paṭiññam kāretvā uyyāne nivāsa ṭṭhāna ādayaḥ kāretvā

original: yāvajīvaṃ paccakabuddhe upaṭṭhahitvā tesu parinibbutesu sādhukīḷanaṃ kāretvā candanā
analyzed: yāvajīvam paccakabuddhe upaṭṭhahitvā tesu parinibbutesu sādhu kīḷanam kāretvā candanā

original: garuādīhi sarīrakiccaṃ kāretvā dhātuyo gahetvā cetiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā evarūpānampi
analyzed: garu ādīhi sarīra kiccam kāretvā dhātuyaḥ gahetvā cetiyam patiṭṭhāpetvā evarūpānam pi

original: mahānubhāvānaṃ mahesīnaṃ maraṇaṃ bhavissati, kimaṅgaṃ pana mādisānanti saṃvegajāto
analyzed: mahā anubhāvānam mahesīnam maraṇam bhavissati kimaṅgam pana saṃvega jātaḥ

original: jeṭṭhaputtaṃ rajje patiṭṭhāpetvā sayaṃ pabbajaṃ pabbaji, devīpi raññe pabbajite ahaṃ
analyzed: jeṭṭha puttam rajje patiṭṭhāpetvā sayam pabbajam pabbaji devī pi raññe pabbajite aham

original: kiṃkarissāmīti pabbajitvā dvepi uyyāne vasantā jhānābhiññaṃ nibbattetvā jhānasukhena
analyzed: kiṃkarissāmi iti pabbajitvā dve api uyyāne vasantā jhāna abhiññam nibbattetvā jhāna sukhena

original: vītināmentā āyupariyosāne brahmaloke nibbattiṃsu. Te amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇakule
analyzed: āyu pariyosāne brahmaloke nibbattiṃsu te amhākam bhagavato kāle brāhmaṇa kule

original: nibbattitvā buddhasāsane pabbajiṃsu, tadā nandiyarājā dhutaṅgadharānaṃ aggo mahākassapattheronāma
analyzed: nibbattitvā buddha sāsane pabbajiṃsu tadā nandiya rājā dhutaṅga dharānam aggaḥ mahākassapa theraḥ nāma

original: hutvā cando viya suriyo viyaca loke pākaṭo hutvā bhagavati pari- nibbute buddhasāsanaṃ
analyzed: hutvā candaḥ viya suriyaḥ viya ca loke pākaṭaḥ hutvā bhagavati pari nibbute buddha sāsanam

original: ativiya sobheti. Bhariyāpissa bhaddakāpiḷānī nāma ahosīti.
analyzed: sobheti bhariyāpissa bhaddakāpiḷānī nāma ahosi iti

original: Datvā pureko vipine caranto,
analyzed: da tvā purā ikaḥ vipine

original: Paccekabuddhassanuvātamattaṃ;
analyzed: paccekabuddhaḥ sanuvāta mattam

original: Katvā saraṭṭhaṃ kurudīpasobhaṃ,
analyzed: katvā saraṭṭham kuru dīpa sobham

original: Mahānubhāvo vasudhā dhiposi.
analyzed: mahā anubhāvaḥ vasudhā dhipā asi

original: Tumheca bhonto khalu sīlavante,
analyzed: tumhe ca bhontaḥ khalu sīlavante

original: Dadātha dānāni anappakāni;
analyzed: dadātha dānāni anappakāni

original: Taṃ vo patiṭṭhāca bhavantarasmiṃ,
analyzed: tam vaḥ patiṭṭhāca bhavantarasmin

original: Cintāmaṇiṃ kappataruṃva sāranti.
analyzed: cintāmaṇim kappatarum iva sāranti

original: Nandiyarājassa vatthuṃ pathamaṃ.

original: manussā yebhuyyena pattamahaṃ nāma pūjaṃ karonti, bhagavatā paribhuttapattaṃ gahetvā

original: katānekapūjāvidhānā ussavaṃ karonti. Taṃ pattamahanti vuccati. Tasmiṃ samaye devaputtanagare
analyzed: kata aneka pūjā vidhānāḥ ussavam karonti tam pattamahanti vuccati tasmin samaye devaputta nagare

original: rājā sabbaratanamayaṃ rathaṃ sabbālaṅkārehi alaṅkārāpetvā kumudapattavaṇṇe cattāro
analyzed: rājā sabba ratana mayam ratham sabba alaṅkārehi alaṅkārāpetvā kumuda patta vaṇṇe cattāro

original: sindhave yojetvā susikkhitasippācariyehi sattaratanapariniṭṭhite asītihatthaveḷagge
analyzed: sindhave yojetvā su sikkhita sippa ācariyehi satta ratana pariniṭṭhite asīti hattha veḷagge

original: satthunā paribhuttaṃ selamayapattaṃ muttājālādīhi alaṅkaritvā veḷaggaṃ āropetvā veḷuṃ
analyzed: satthunā paribhuttam sela maya pattam muttā jāla ādīhi alaṅkaritvā veḷaggam āropetvā veḷum

original: rathe ṭhapāpetvā nagaraṃ devanagaraṃ viya alaṅkaritvā dhajapatākādayo ussāpetvā toraṇaggha
analyzed: rathe nagaram devanagaram alaṅkaritvā dhaja patākā ādayaḥ alaṅkaritvā dhaja patākā ādayaḥ

original: kapantiyoca puṇṇaghaṭadīpamālādayoca patiṭṭhāpetvā anekehi pūjāvidhānehi nagaraṃ
analyzed: puṇṇa ghaṭa dīpa mālā ādayo ca patiṭṭhāpetvā anekehi pūjā vidhānehi nagaram

original: padakkhiṇaṃ kāretvā nagaramajjhe susajjitaratanamaṇḍape pattadhātuṃ ṭhapetvā sattame
analyzed: padakkhiṇam kāretvā nagara majjhe su sajjita ratana maṇḍape patta dhātum ṭhapetvā sattame

original: divase mahādhammasavaṇaṃ kārāpesi. Tadā tasmiṃ janapade bahū manussāca devatāca yakkharakkhasanāgasupaṇṇādayoca
analyzed: divase mahā dhamma savaṇam kārāpesi tadā tasmin janapade bahū manussāḥ ca devatāḥ ca yakkha rakkhasa nāga supaṇṇa ādayaḥ ca

original: manussavesena yebhuyyena taṃ samāgamaṃ otaranti, evamacchariyaṃ taṃ pūjāvidhānaṃ ahosi.
analyzed: manussa vesena yebhuyyena tam samāgamam otaranti evam acchariyam tam pūjā vidhānam ahosi

original: Tadā eko nāgarājā uttamarūpadharaṃ agatapubbapurisaṃ ekaṃ kumārikaṃ dhammaparisantare
analyzed: tadā ekaḥ nāga rājā uttama rūpa dharam a gata pubba purisam ekam kumārikam dhamma parisantare

original: nisinnaṃ disvā tassā paṭibaddhacitto anekākārehi taṃ yā ci tvā tassā aladdhamāno

original: kujjhitvā nāsāvātaṃ vissajjesi imaṃ māressāmīti. Taṃ tassā saddhābalena kiñci upaddavaṃ

original: kātuṃ samattho nāhosi. Athassā nāgo pādato paṭṭhāya yāvasakalasarīraṃ bhogena veṭhetvā

analyzed: dukkham na ahosi pabhātāya rattiyā tam disvā manussā kim etat ti kāraṇam pucchiṃsu

original: sāpi tesaṃ kathetvā evaṃ saccakiriyamakāsi. Tathāhi.

original: Brahmacārī ahosāhaṃ, sañjātā idha mānuse;

original: Tena saccena maṃ nāgo, khippameva pamuñcatu.
analyzed: tena saccena mam nāgaḥ khippam eva pamuñcatu

analyzed: kāma āturassa nāgassa nokāsam akariṃyataḥ

original: Tena saccena maṃ nāgo, khippameva muñcatu.
analyzed: tena saccena mam nāgaḥ khippam eva muñcatu

original: Visavātena khittassa, kupitassoragassahaṃ;
analyzed: visa vātena khittassa kupitassa uragassa aham

original: Akuddhā tena saccena, so maṃ khippaṃ pamuñcatu.
analyzed: akuddhā tena saccena saḥ mama khippam pamuñcatu

original: Saddhammaṃ suṇamānāhaṃ, garugāravabhattiyā;
analyzed: saddhammam suṇamānā aham garu gārava bhattiyā

original: Assosiṃ tena saccena, khippaṃ nāgo pamuñcatu.

original: Akkharaṃvā padaṃvāpi, avināsetvāva ādito;

original: Assosiṃ tena saccena, khippaṃ nāgo pamuñcatūti.
analyzed: assosim tena saccena khippam nāgaḥ pamuñcatu uti

analyzed: tam phaṇa gabbhe nisīdāpetvā bahūhi nāga mānavakehi saddhim udakapūjam nāma pūja makāsi

original: taṃ disvā bahū nagaravāsino acchariyabbhutajātā aṭṭhārasakoṭidhanena pūja makaṃsu. Tathāhi.
analyzed: tam disvā bahū nagara vāsinaḥ acchariya abbhuta jātāḥ aṭṭhārasa koṭi dhanena tathā hi

original: Natthi saddhāsamo loke, suhado sabbakāmado;
analyzed: natthi saddhā samaḥ loke su hadaḥ sabba kāma do

original: Passathassā balaṃ saddhā, pūjentevaṃ naro ragā.
analyzed: balam saddhā pūjentā ivam naraḥ

original: Idha lokeva sālattha, bhavabhoga manappakaṃ;
analyzed: idha lokā iva sā alattha bhava bhoga manappakam

original: Tasmā saddhena kātabbaṃ, ratanattayagāravanti.
analyzed: tasmā saddhena kātabbam

original: Athevaṃ sā paṭiladdhamahāvibhavā yāvajīvaṃ komāriya brahmacāriṇī hutvā āyupariyosāne

original: kālaṃ katvā tasmiṃyeva nagare rañño aggamahesiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhitvā dasamāsaccayena

original: mātukucchito nikkhami. Nikkhantadivase panassā sakaladevaputtanagare ratanavassaṃ

original: vassi. Tenassā kañjanadevīti nāmaṃ kariṃsu. Samantapāsādikā ahosi. Abhirūpā devaccharapaṭibhāgā.
analyzed: tena assā kañjanadevī iti nāmam kariṃsu samanta pāsādikā ahosi abhirūpā deva chara paṭibhāgā

original: Mukhato uppalagandho vāyati. Sarīrato candanagandho vāyati. Sakalasarīrato bālasuriyo

original: viya raṃsiyo nicchārentī caturatanagabbhe padīpakiccaṃ nāma natthi. Sabbo gabbho
analyzed: catu ratana gabbhe padīpa kiccam nāma na atthi sabbaḥ gabbhaḥ

original: sarīrā lokena eko bhāso hoti, tassā rūpasampatti sakalajambudīpe pākaṭā ahosi. Tato
analyzed: lokena ekaḥ bhāsaḥ hoti tassā rūpa sampatti sakala jambudīpe pākaṭā ahosi tato

analyzed: vaḍḍhetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattam pāpuṇīti

original: Sutvāna sādaravasena kumārikevaṃ;
analyzed: sutvāna sādara vasena kumārikā ivam

original: Dhammañhi sīlamamalaṃ paripālayantī;
analyzed: dhamman hi sīlam amalam paripālayantī

original: Laddhāna nekavibhavaṃ vibhavaṃ payātā,

original: Mā bho pamajjatha sadā kusalappayogeti.
analyzed: mā bho pamajjatha sadā kusala ppayoga iti

original: Kañcanadeviyā vatthuṃ catutthaṃ.
analyzed: kañcanadeviyāḥ vatthum catutthaṃ

original: 15. Byagghassa vatthumhi ayamānupubbīkathā
analyzed: byagghassa vatthumhi

analyzed: hoti tattha vemajjhe ekaḥ byagghaḥ attanaḥ andha pitaram pabbata guhāyam katvā posentaḥ

original: vasati. Tasseva pabbatassa vanadvāre tuṇḍilo nāma eko suvapotako rukkhasmiṃ vasati.
analyzed: vasati tassa iva pabbatassa vana dvāre tuṇḍilaḥ nāma ekaḥ su vapotakaḥ rukkhasmiṃ vasati

original: Te ubhopi aññamaññaṃ piyasahāyā ahesuṃ, tasmiṃ samaye paccantagāmavāsī eko manusso

original: attano mātugāmena saddhiṃ kalahaṃ katvā bārāṇasiṃ gacchanto taṃ vanadvāraṃ sampāpuṇi.
analyzed: attanaḥ mātu gāmena saddhim kalaham katvā bārāṇasim gacchantaḥ tam vana dvāram sampāpuṇi

original: Atha suvapotako parihīnattabhāvaṃ dukkhitaṃ taṃ disvā kampamānahadayo taṃ pakkositvā
analyzed: atha suva potakaḥ parihīna atta bhāvam dukkhitam tam disvā kampamāna hadayaḥ tam pakkositvā

original: bho kuhiṃ gacchasīti āha, tena parakhaṇḍaṃ gacchāmīti vutte tuṇḍilo bho imasmiṃ vanakhaṇḍamajjhe

original: āha. Tuṇḍilo tenahi samma yadi anivattamāno gacchasi. Eso byaggho mama sahāyo. Me

original: vacanaṃ tava santikā sutvā na gaṇhātīti. Tassa taṃ anādiyanto so suvarāje paduṭṭhacitto
analyzed: vacanam tava santikā sutvā na gaṇhāti iti tassa tam an ādiyantaḥ saḥ suvarāje paduṭṭha citto

original: sa idha lokaparalokesu dukkhāvahoyeva. Tathāhi.

original: Mayā kataṃ mayhamidaṃ, iti vessānaraṃ naro;

original: Samāliṅgati sappemo, dahatevassa viggahaṃ.
analyzed: samāliṅgati sappemaḥ viggaham

original: Madhukhīrādidānena, pemasā paripālito;
analyzed: madhu khīra ādi dānena pemasā

original: Sorago kupitovassa, ḍasatevassa viggahaṃ.
analyzed: soragaḥ viggaham

original: Evaṃ nihīnajaccena, pāpena akataññunā;

original: Narā dhamena dīnena, katopi khaṇasaṅgamo.

original: Asādhuko ayaṃtevaṃ, jānamānena jantunā;

original: Muhuttampi na kātabbo, saṅgamo so anatthadoti.
analyzed: muhuttam pi na kātabbaḥ saṅgamaḥ saḥ anattha do ti

original: byaggho attamano ehi sammāti taṃ pakkositvā attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ netvā khāditabbāhārena

original: taṃ santappetvā pitusantike nisīdāpetvā puna vanakhaṇḍa magamāsi. Athassa pitā puttassa
analyzed: tam santappetvā pitu santike nisīdāpetvā puna vanakhaṇḍa magamāsi athassa pitā puttassa

original: gatakāle tena saddhiṃ sallapanto tassa vacanānusārena tuṇḍilaṃ māretvā khāditabhāvaṃ
analyzed: gata kāle tena saddhim sallapanto tassa vacana anusārena tuṇḍilam māretvā khādita bhāvam

original: aññāsi. Tato so puttassa āgatakāle tava sahāyo tena māritoti āha. Taṃ sutvā byaggho

original: anattamano vegena tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā samma tuṇḍilāti saddaṃ katvā apassanto
analyzed: anattamanaḥ vegena tassa vasanaṭṭhānam gantvā samma tuṇḍilā ti saddam katvā a passanto

original: luñcitapattaṃcassa disvā nissaṃsayaṃ tena mārito me sahāyoti socanto paridevanto
analyzed: disvā nissaṃsayam tena māritaḥ me sahāyaḥ iti socantaḥ paridevantaḥ

original: āgañchi. Atha so asappuriso tasmiṃ tattha gate tassa pitaraṃ pāsāṇena paharitvā māretvā
analyzed: āgañchi atha saḥ asappurisaḥ tasmin tattha gate tassa pitaram pāsāṇena paharitvā māretvā

original: byagghaṃca dāni māressāmīti byagghāgamanamaggaṃ olokento nilīno aṭṭhāsi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe

analyzed: byagghaḥ api āgañchi saḥ tassāḥ gata kāle tassa tejena bhītaḥ gantvā jīvitam me sāmi dehi iti

original: mama sahāyassa sāsanamādāyāgatassa dubbhituṃ na yuttanti cintento taṃ samassāsetvā
analyzed: mama sahāyassa sāsanam ādāya āgatassa na yuttam ti cintentaḥ tam samassāsetvā

original: gaccha sammāti sukhaṃ pesesi. Evañhi sappurisasamāgamo nāma idha lokaparalokesu sukhāvahoyeva, vuttaṃhi.
analyzed: gaccha sammā iti sukham pesesi evam hi sappurisa samāgamaḥ nāma idha loka para lokesu sukha āvahaḥ yeva vuttam hi

original: Sabbhireva samāsetha, sabbhi kubbetha santhavaṃ;
analyzed: sabbhiḥ eva samāsetha sabbhi kubbetha santhavam

original: Sabbattha santhavo tena, seyyo hoti na pāpiyo.
analyzed: sabbattha santhavaḥ tena seyyaḥ hoti na pāpiyaḥ

original: Tasmā sappuriseheva, saṅgamo hotu jantunaṃ.

original: Evaṃvidhopi pharuso paramaṃsabhojī;

analyzed: tam vaḥ dadāti vibhavañca bhavesu

original: Byagghassa vatthuṃ pañcamaṃ.
analyzed: byagghassa vatthum pañcamaṃ

analyzed: phalaka khaṇḍa dinnassa vatthumhi ayam ānupubbī kathā

original: 20. Sahāyassa pariccattajīvitakassa vatthumhi ayamānupubbīkathā

original: Bhagavati parinibbute sāvatthiyaṃ somabrāhmaṇo somadattabrāhmaṇoti dve brāhmaṇā vasanti.
analyzed: bhagavati parinibbute sāvatthiyam soma brāhmaṇaḥ somadatta brāhmaṇaḥ uti dve brāhmaṇāḥ vasanti

original: Tattha somadattabrāhmaṇena saddhiṃ somabrāhmaṇo yebhuyyena dūtaṃ kīḷati. Athekadivasaṃ
analyzed: tattha somadatta brāhmaṇena saddhim soma brāhmaṇaḥ yebhuyyena dūtam kīḍati atha eka divasam

original: somadatto somabrāhmaṇaṃ tena parājetvā tassa uttarāsaṅgañca lañchanamuddikañca gahetvā
analyzed: somadattaḥ soma brāhmaṇam tena parājetvā tassa uttarāsaṅgam ca lañchana muddikam ca gahetvā

original: attano gehaṃ gacchanto somabrāhmaṇassa ehi gehaṃ gacchā- māti āha. Tato somo nāhaṃ
analyzed: attanaḥ geham gacchantaḥ somabrāhmaṇassa ehi geham gaccha mā ati āha tatas somaḥ na aham

original: samma ekasāṭako hutvā antaravīthiṃ otarituṃ sakkomi. Gamanato ettheva me ṭhānaṃ varataranti
analyzed: samma eka sāṭakaḥ hutvā antara vīthim otaritum sakkomi gamanataḥ ettha iva me ṭhānam varataranti

original: āha, somadattena evaṃ sati samma imaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ gaṇhāti tassa taṃ datvā idāni
analyzed: āha somadattena evam sati samme imam uttarāsaṅgam gaṇhāti tassa tam da tvā idāni

original: samma ehīti vuttopi nāgacchati. Puna tena bho kasmā nāgacchasīti puṭṭho samma mama
analyzed: samma ehi iti vuttaḥ api na āgacchati puna tena bho kasmā na āgacchasi iti puṭṭhaḥ samma mama

original: hatthe muddikaṃ apassantā me puttadārādayo mayā saddhiṃ kalahaṃ karontīti āha, atha
analyzed: hatthe muddikam a passantā me putta dāra ādayaḥ mayā saddhim kalaham karonti iti āha atha

original: so evaṃ sante yadā te pahoti. Tadā mayhaṃ dehīti muddikampi datvā taṃ gahetvā gehaṃ
analyzed: saḥ evam sante yadā te tadā mayham dehi iti tam gahetvā geham

original: agamāsi. Atha te ettakena sahāyā ahesuṃ. Aparabhāge somadattabrāhmaṇaṃ ayaṃ paradārakammaṃ
analyzed: agamāsi atha te ettakena sahāyāḥ ahesum aparabhāge somadatta brāhmaṇam ayam para dāra kammaṃ

original: akāsīti manussā gahetvā rañño dassesuṃ. Rājā tassa rūpasampattiṃ disvā rājāṇaṃ akatvā
analyzed: akāsi iti manussāḥ gahetvā raññaḥ dassesum rājā tassa rūpa sampattim disvā rājāṇam a katvā

original: mā bho puna evamakāsīti ovaditvā vissajjesi. Rājā naṃ yāvatatiyavāraṃ ovadanto vissajjetvā
analyzed: mā bho punar evam akāsi iti ovaditvā vissajjesi rājā nam yāvatatiya vāram ovadantaḥ vissajjetvā

original: catutthevāre gacchathetaṃ āghātanaṃ netvā mārethāti āṇāpesi. Evaṃ pāpakamme niratā
analyzed: catutthe vāre gacchatha itam āghātanam netvā māretha ati āṇāpesi evam pāpa kamme niratā

original: anekākārena ovadantāpi na sakkā nivāretuṃ. Tathāhi.
analyzed: aneka ākārena ovadantā api na sakkā nivāretum tathā hi

original: Soṇā ceva sigālā ca, vāyasā nīlamakkhikā;
analyzed: soṇā ca iva sigālā ca vāyasā nīlamakkhikā

original: Iccete kuṇape sattā, na sakkā te nisedhituṃ.
analyzed: iccā ite kuṇape sattāḥ na sakkā te nisedhitum

original: Tathā pāṇātipātesu, paradāre surāya ca;
analyzed: tathā pāṇa atipātesu paradāre surāya ca

original: Musāvādesu theyyesu, sattasattā na vāriyāti.
analyzed: musāvādesu theyyesu satta sattā na

original: Tato rājapurisā taṃ bandhitvā pakkamiṃsu. Tadā somabrāhmaṇo somadattaṃ tathā nīyamānaṃ
analyzed: tatas rāja purisā tam bandhitvā tadā soma brāhmaṇaḥ somadattam tathā nīyamānam

original: disvā kampamānahadayo rājapurisānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā imaṃ bho muhuttaṃ mā māretha.
analyzed: disvā kampamāna hadayaḥ rāja purisānam santikam gantvā imam bho muhuttam mā māretha

original: Yāva rājānaṃ jānāpessāmīti vatvā rañño santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ṭhito deva mama jīvitaṃ
analyzed: yāva rājānam jānāpessāmi iti vatvā rañño santikam gantvā vanditvā ṭhitaḥ deva mama jīvitam

original: somadattassa brāhmaṇassa dassāmi. Etaṃ muñcatha. Yadi māretukāmā, maṃ mārethāti āha.
analyzed: somadattassa brāhmaṇassa dassāmi etam muñcatha yadi mā āretu kāmāḥ mam māretha iti āha

original: Rājā tuṇhī tuṭṭho itikatthaci ahosi, rājapurisā somadattaṃ muñcitvā somabrāhmaṇaṃ
analyzed: rājā tuṇhī tuṭṭhaḥ itikatthaci ahosi rāja purisā somadattam muñcitvā soma brāhmaṇam

original: āghātanaṃ netvā māresuṃ, aho kataññuno kataveditā.
analyzed: āghātanam netvā māresum aho kataññuno kata veditā

original: Hoti cettha.
analyzed: hoti ca itthā

original: Kakūpakāra mattānaṃ, sarantā keci mānusā;
analyzed: mattānam sarantā keci mānusā

original: Jīvitaṃ denti somova, somadattassa attanoti.
analyzed: jīvitam denti somaḥ uva soma dattassa attanoti

original: So tena jīvitadānena devaloke nibbattitvā mahante kanakavimāne devaccharāsahassaparivuto
analyzed: so tena jīvita dānena deva loke nibbattitvā mahante kanaka vimāne deva charā sahassa parivutaḥ

original: dibbasampattimanubhonto paṭivasati. Tadā somadattabrāhmaṇo eso maṃ maraṇappattaṃ
analyzed: dibba sampattim anubhonto paṭivasati tadā somadatta brāhmaṇaḥ esaḥ mam maraṇa ppattam

original: mocesīti vatvā tassatthāya dānaṃ datvā pattiṃ adāsi. Tāvadevassa tato bahutaraṃ devissariyaṃ
analyzed: mocesi iti vatvā tassa atthāya dānam da tvā pattim adāsi tāva devassa tatas bahutaram devissariyam

original: ahosi devānubhāvañca. Tato so somadevo attano devissariyaṃ olokento sahāyassa attano
analyzed: ahosi deva anubhāvañca tatas saḥ somadevaḥ attano devissariyam olokento sahāyassa attano

original: jīvitadānaṃ addasa. Disvā attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā māṇavakavaṇṇena somadattabrāhmaṇaṃ
analyzed: jīvita dānam addasa disvā atta bhāvam vijahitvā māṇavaka vaṇṇena somadatta brāhmaṇam

original: upasaṅkamitvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā attānaṃ devaloke nibbattabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā taṃ gahetvā
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā paṭisanthāram katvā attānam deva loke nibbatta bhāvam pakāsetvā tam gahetvā

original: attano ānubhāvena devalokaṃ netvā yathākāmaṃ sampatti manubhavāti vatvā sattāhaṃ
analyzed: ānubhāvena deva lokam netvā yathākāmam sampatti manubhavāti vatvā sattāham

original: devassariyaṃ datvā sattame divase netvā tassa geheyeva patiṭṭhāpesi. Tattha hi dibbasampatti
analyzed: devassariyam da tvā sattame divase netvā tassa geheyeva patiṭṭhāpesi tattha hi dibba sampatti

original: manubhūtassa manussasampatti paṭikkulā hoti. Tato so dibbasampattimanussaranto kiso
analyzed: manubhūtassa manussa sampatti paṭikkulā hoti tatas saḥ dibba sampattim anussarantaḥ kiso

original: dubbalo uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāto ahosi. Athekadivasaṃ devaputto taṃ olokento tathā dukkhappattaṃ
analyzed: dubbalaḥ uppaṇḍu paṇḍuka jātaḥ ahosi atha eka divasam devaputto tam olokento tathā dukkha ppattam

original: disvā na sakkā manussena dibbasampattimanubhavitunti icchiticchitasampattidāyakaṃ
analyzed: disvā na sakkā manussena dibba sampattim anubhavitun ti icchiti chita sampatti dāyakam

original: ekaṃ cintāmaṇiṃ datvā tassa bhariyampi attano ānubhāvena rūpavanthaṃ yasavantaṃ vaṇṇavantaṃ
analyzed: ekam cintāmaṇim da tvā tassa bhariyam pi attanaḥ ānubhāvena rūpavantham yasavantam vaṇṇavantam

original: atikkantamanussitthivaṇṇaṃ akāsi, aparabhāge te jayampatikā paccakkhato diṭṭhadibbasampattivibhavā
analyzed: atikkanta manussitthi vaṇṇam akāsi aparabhāge te jayampatikā paccakkhataḥ diṭṭha dibba sampatti vibhavā

original: dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ rakkhitvā sahāyadevaputtassa santikeyeva nibbattiṃsūti.
analyzed: dānam datvā sīlam rakkhitvā sahāyadeva puttassa santikeyeva iva nibbattiṃsu iti

original: Mandena nanditamanā upakārakena,
analyzed: mandena nandita manāḥ upakārakena

original: Pāṇampi denti sujanā iti cintayitvā;
analyzed: denti su janāḥ iti cintayitvā

original: Mittaddu mā bhavatha bho upakārakassa;
analyzed: mittaddu mā bhavatha bho upakārakassa

original: Pāsaṃsiyā bhavatha sādhujanehi niccaṃti.
analyzed: pāsaṃsiyāḥ bhavatha sādhu janehi

original: Sahāyassa pariccattajīvitakassa vatthuṃ dasamaṃ.
analyzed: sahāyassa pariccatta jīvitakassa vatthum dasamaṃ

original: Nandiyarājavaggo dutiyo.
analyzed: nandiya rāja vaggo dutiyaḥ

original: Yakkhavañcitavaggo
analyzed: yakkha vañcita vaggaḥ

original: 21. Yakkhavañcita vatthumhi ayamānupubbīkathā
analyzed: yakkha vañcita vatthumhi

original: Bhagavati parinibbutamhi kosalarañño kira janapade tuṇḍagāmonāma ahosi. Tattheko
analyzed: bhagavati parinibbutamhi kosala raññaḥ kira janapade tuṇḍagāmo nāma ahosi tattha ekaḥ

original: buddhadāso nāma manusso “yāvajīvaṃ buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi. Buddho me saraṇaṃ tāṇaṃ

original: leṇaṃ parāyaṇanti” evaṃ jīvitapariyantaṃ buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato paṭivasati, tasmiṃ
analyzed: evam jīvita pariyantam buddham saraṇam gataḥ paṭivasati tasmin

analyzed: samaye ekaḥ janapada vāsiko tattha tattha āhiṇḍantaḥ tam tuṇḍa gāmam patvā tassa iva ghare

original: nivāsaṃ kappesi, tassa pana jānapadikassa sarīre eko yakkho āvisitvā pīḷeti, tadā
analyzed: nivāsam kappesi tassa pana jānapadikassa sarīre ekaḥ yakkhaḥ āvisitvā pīḷeti tadā

original: tassa gāmassa pavisanakāle yakkho buddhadāso pāsakassa guṇatejena tassa gehaṃ pavisituṃ
analyzed: tassa gāmassa pavisana kāle yakkhaḥ buddha dāsaḥ pāsakassa guṇa tejena tassa geham pavisitum

original: asakkonto taṃ muñcitvā bahigāme sattāhaṃ aṭṭhāsi tassāgamanaṃ olokento. Tato so jānapadiko
analyzed: a sakkonto tam muñcitvā bahigāme sattāham aṭṭhāsi tassa āgamanam olokento tato so jānapadiko

original: sattadivasaṃ tattha vasitvā sattame divase sakaraṭṭhaṃ gantukāmo gāmā nikkhami. Atha
analyzed: satta divasam tattha vasitvā sattame divase sakaraṭṭham gantu kāmo gāmā nikkhami atha

original: taṃ tathā nikkhantaṃ disvā yakkho aggahesi, atha so taṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ kuhiṃgatosīti
analyzed: tam tathā nikkhantam disvā yakkhaḥ aggahesi atha saḥ tam ettakam kālam kuhiṃgataḥ asi iti

original: pucchi. Yakkho bho tavatthāya ettha vasantassa me sattāhaṃ atikkantanti. Tato so
analyzed: pucchi yakkhaḥ bho tavatthāya ettha vasantassa me sattāham atikkantanti tatas so

original: ko te mayā attho, kiṃ te dammīti, atha yakkhena bho ahaṃ khudāya pīḷito bhattena
analyzed: kaḥ te mayā atthaḥ kim te dammi iti atha yakkhena bho aham khudāya pīḍitaḥ bhattena

original: me atthoti vutto so evaṃ sati kasmā maṃ antogehe vasantaṃ na gaṇhīti āha. Yakkhena
analyzed: me attho ti vutto saḥ evam sati kasmā mam antogehe vasantam na gaṇhi iti āha yakkhena

original: bho tasmiṃ ghare buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato eko upasako atthi, tassa sīlatejena gehaṃ pavisitumasakkonto
analyzed: bho tasmin ghare buddham saraṇam gataḥ ekaḥ upasakaḥ atthi tassa sīla tejena geham pavisitum a sakkontaḥ

original: aṭṭhāsinti vutto jānapadiko saraṇaṃ nāma kinti ajānanto kinti vatvā so saraṇaṃ aggahesīti
analyzed: aṭṭhāsinti vuttaḥ jānapadiko saraṇam nāma kinti a jānanto kinti vatvā saḥ saraṇam aggahesi iti

original: yakkhaṃ pucchi. Yakkho “buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti vatvā saraṇaṃ aggahesīti āha.
analyzed: yakkham pucchi yakkhaḥ buddham saraṇam gacchāmi iti vatvā saraṇam aggahesi iti āha

original: Taṃ sutvā jānapadiko idāni imaṃ vañcessāmīti cintetvā tenahi yakkha ahampi buddhaṃ
analyzed: tam sutvā jānapadikaḥ idāni imam vañcessāmi iti cintetvā tena hi yakkha aham pi buddham

original: saraṇaṃ gacchāmīti āha. Evaṃ vuttamatteyeva yakkho mahāsaddaṃ karonto bha ye na bhamanto
analyzed: saraṇam gacchāmi iti āha evam yakkhaḥ mahā saddam karontaḥ na bhamantaḥ

original: palāyi, evaṃ sammāsambuddhassa saraṇaṃ idhaloke bhayo paddava nivāraṇatthaṃ hoti,
analyzed: palāyi evam sammāsambuddhassa saraṇam idha loke bhayaḥ paddava nivāraṇa attham hoti

original: paraloke saggamokkhāvahaṃ. Tathāhi.
analyzed: para loke sagga mokkha āvaham tathā hi

original: Buddhoti vacanaṃ etaṃ, amanussānaṃ bhayāvahaṃ;
analyzed: buddhaḥ iti vacanam etam amanussānam bhaya āvaham

original: Buddhabhattikajantūnaṃ, sabbadā mudamāvahaṃ.
analyzed: buddha bhattika jantūnam sabbadā mudam āvaham

original: Sabbopaddavanāsāya, paccakkhadibbamosadhaṃ;
analyzed: sabba upaddava nāsāya paccakkha dibba mosadham

original: Dibbamantaṃ mahātejaṃ, mahāyantaṃ mahabbhutaṃ.
analyzed: dibbamantam mahā tejam mahāyantam mahabbhutam

original: Tasmā so dāruṇo yakkho,
analyzed: tasmā saḥ dāruṇaḥ yakkhaḥ

original: Disvā taṃ saraṇe ṭhithaṃ;
analyzed: disvā tam saraṇe ṭhitham

original: Ubbiggo ca bhayappatto,
analyzed: ubbiggaḥ ca bhaya ppatto

original: Lomahaṭṭho ca chambhīto.
analyzed: lomahaṭṭhaḥ ca chambhītaḥ

original: Bhamanto dhāvitaṃ disvā, timirova suriyuggate,
analyzed: bhamantaḥ dhāvitam disvā timirā uva suri yuj gate

original: Simbalitūlabhaṭṭhaṃva, caṇḍavātena khaṇḍitaṃ.
analyzed: caṇḍa vātena khaṇḍitam

original: Yaṃ dukkhaṃ rājacorāri, yakkhapetā disambhavaṃ;
analyzed: yam dukkham rāja cora ari yakkha petā disambhavam

original: Nicchantena manussena, gantabbaṃ saraṇattayaṃti.
analyzed: nicchantena manussena gantabbam saraṇattayan ti

original: Tato jānapadiko saraṇāgamane mahāguṇaṃ mahānisaṃsaṃ oloketvā buddhe sagāravo sappemo

original: jīvitapariyosāne suttappabuddhoviya devaloke nibbattīti.
analyzed: jīvita pariyosāne deva loke nibbatti iti

original: Disvāna evaṃ saraṇaṃ gataṃ taṃ,
analyzed: disvānaḥ evam saraṇam gatam tam

original: Apenti yakkhāpi mahabbhayena;
analyzed: apenti yakkhā api mahabbhayena

original: Pāletha sīlaṃ saraṇañca tasmā,
analyzed: pāletha sīlam saraṇañca tasmai

original: Jahātha duritaṃ sugatiṃ bhajavhoti.
analyzed: jahātha duritam su gatim

original: Yakkhavañcitavatthuṃ pathamaṃ.
analyzed: yakkha vañcita vatthum pathamam

analyzed: micchadiṭṭhikassa vatthumhi ayam ānupubbīkathā

original: Bhagavati dharamāne rājagahanagare kira eko brahmabhattiko micchādiṭṭhiko paṭivasati,
analyzed: bhagavati dharamāne rājagaha nagare kira ekaḥ brahmabhattikaḥ micchādiṭṭhikaḥ paṭivasati

original: Athāparabhāge guḷakīḷaṃkīḷantānaṃ sammādiṭṭhikassa putto “namo buddhayā”ti vatvā

analyzed: namaḥ buddhāya iti vatvā khipāmi iti āha saḥ api tatas paṭṭhāya namaḥ buddhāya iti vatvā

original: khipati, atha te yebhuyyena dūte samasamāva honti. Aparabhāge micchādiṭṭhikassa putto
analyzed: khipati atha te yebhuyyena dūte samasamāva honti aparabhāge micchādiṭṭhikassa putto

original: pitarā saddhiṃ dārūnamatthāya vanaṃ gantvā sakaṭena dāruṃ gahetvā āgacchanto nagaradvārasamīpe
analyzed: pitarā saddhim vanam gantvā sakaṭena dārum gahetvā āgacchantaḥ nagara dvāra samīpe

original: sakaṭaṃ vissajjetvā tiṇe khādanatthāya goṇe vissajjesi, goṇā tiṇaṃ khādanto aññehi

original: gorūpehi saddhiṃ antonagaraṃ pavisiṃsu. Athassa pitā goṇe pariyesanto sakaṭaṃ olokehīti
analyzed: go rūpehi saddhim antonagaram pavisiṃsu athassa pitā goṇe pariyesantaḥ sakaṭam olokehi iti

original: puttaṃ nivattetvā nagaraṃ paviṭṭho ahosi, atha sāyaṇhe jāte manussā nagaradvāraṃ

original: tesaṃ vacanaṃ sampaṭicchi. Atha te evaṃ sati amhehi saddhiṃ āgacchāhīti vatvā naṃ
analyzed: tesam vacanam atha te evam sati amhehi saddhim āgacchāhi iti vatvā naṃ

original: gahetvā antonagaraṃ paviṭṭhā tattha tattha vilumpantā corakammaṃ akaṃsu. Tadā jānapadiko
analyzed: gahetvā antonagaram paviṭṭhā tattha tattha vilumpantā cora kammam akaṃsu tadā jānapadiko

original: laddhavibhavo imameva varataranti tehi saddhiṃ corakammaṃ karonto jīvikaṃ kappesi,
analyzed: laddha vibhavaḥ imam eva varataranti tehi saddhim cora kammam karontaḥ jīvikam kappesi

original: athekadivasaṃ rājapurisā katakamme te sabbeva gahetvā pacchābāhaṃ gāḷhaṃ bandhitvā
analyzed: atha eka divasam rāja purisā kata kamme te sabbe iva gahetvā pacchābāham gāḷham bandhitvā

original: kosalarañño dassesuṃ, rājā te disvā evamāha, bhaṇe tumhākaṃ antare yo etesaṃ māretvā
analyzed: kosala raññaḥ dassesum rājā te disvā evam āha bhaṇe tumhākam antare yaḥ etesam māretvā

original: jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpessati, tassa jīvitadānaṃ dammīti, taṃ sutvā te corā sabbe aññamaññañātisuhadasambandhabhāvena
analyzed: jīvita khayam pāpessati tassa jīvita dānam dammi iti tam sutvā te corā sabbe añña mañña ñāti suhada sambandha bhāvena

original: taṃ na icchiṃsu. So pana janapadavāsī manusso ahamete sabbe māressāmīti rañño vatvā
analyzed: tam naḥ icchiṃsu saḥ pana janapada vāsī manusso aham ete sabbe māressāmi iti raññaḥ vatvā

original: tenānuññāto te sabbe māresi. Taṃ disvā tuṭṭho rājā tassa coraghātakammaṃ adāsi. So
analyzed: tena anuññātaḥ te sabbe māresi tam disvā tuṭṭhaḥ rājā tassa cora ghāta kammam adāsi so

original: core ca vajjhappatte ca mārento pañcavīsativassāni vasanto aparabhāge mahallako ahosi.
analyzed: core ca vajjhappatte ca mārentaḥ pañcavīsati vassāni vasantaḥ aparabhāge mahallakaḥ ahosi

original: Atha so mandabalattā katipayapahārenāpi coraṃ māretuṃ na sakkoti, rājā taṃ ñatvā
analyzed: atha saḥ manda balattā katipaya pahārena api coram māretum na sakkoti rājā tam ñatvā

original: aññassa coraghātakammaṃ adāsi. Atha so coraghātakammā coraghātakamma itipikatthaci
analyzed: aññassa cora ghāta kammam adāsi atha saḥ cora ghāta kammā cora ghāta kammaḥ iti pi katthaci

original: parihīno attano gehe vasati. Tadā aññataro manusso mantaṃ parivattetvā nāsāvātena

original: manussamāraṇakamantaṃ jānāti. Tathāhi hatthapādakaṇṇanāsasīsādīsu yaṃkiñci chejjabhejjaṃ

original: mantānubhāvena chejjabhejjakammaṃ karissāmīti. Rājā taṃ sāsanaṃ sutvā sādhūti taṃ

original: nipanno hoti, tato tassa paṭivissakagehe manussā tassa bhayānakasaddasavaṇena gehaṃ
analyzed: nipannaḥ hoti tatas tassa paṭivissaka gehe manussā tassa bhayānaka sadda savaṇena geham

original: chaṭṭetvā palāyiṃsu. Tasmiṃ kira divase mahāsāriputtatthero dibbacakkhunā lokaṃ olokentā

original: taṃ coraghātakaṃ tadaheva kālaṃkatvā niraye nibbattamānaṃ disvā mayi tattha gate

original: pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā tassa gharadvāra magamāsi. Atha so theraṃ disvā kuddho
analyzed: pubbaṇhasamayam nivāsetvā tassa ghara dvāra magamāsi atha saḥ theram disvā kuddhaḥ

original: kopena taṭataṭāyamānadeho ajja taṃ vijjhitvā phāletvā māressāmīti nipannova mantaṃ

original: parivattetvā nāsāvātaṃ vissajjesi, thero tasmiṃ khaṇe nirodhasamāpanno nirodhā vuṭṭhāya

original: Dānaṃ tāṇaṃ manussānaṃ, dānaṃ duggativāraṇaṃ;

original: Dānaṃ saggassa sopānaṃ, dānaṃ santikaraṃ paraṃ.

original: Icchiticchitadānena, dānaṃ cintāmaṇī viya;

original: Sīlavantassa dānena, cakkavattisirimpi ca;

analyzed: labhanti sakka sampattim tathā lokuttaram sukham

original: sabbaṃ taṃ kusalaṃ pakāsesi. Tenettha.
analyzed: sabbam tat kusalam pakāsesi tena ittha

analyzed: appaggham sahassena yācatha ki manena karotha ati pucchi tehi sambuddha tthāya ati vutte

original: tenahi ahameva dassāmīti jīramaricādīhi sakkharamadhuphāṇitādayo yojetvā dānaggaṃ

analyzed: upanāmesi tam satthu ānubhāvena buddha pamukhassa aṭṭhasaṭṭhi bhikkhu sata sahassassa

original: pahoṇakaṃ ahosi. Tato so tena puññakammena devamanussalokesu sampatti manubhavitvā
analyzed: pahoṇakam ahosi tatas so tena puñña kammena deva manussa lokesu sampatti manubhavitvā

original: aparabhāge amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle koliyanagare mahālilicchavirañño upanissāya suppiyāya
analyzed: aparabhāge amhākam bhagavato kāle koliya nagare mahāliliccha viraññaḥ upanissāya suppiyāya

original: nāma aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. So sattamāsasattasaṃvaccharāni mātukucchiyaṃ
analyzed: nāma aggamahesiyā kucchismim paṭisandhim gaṇhi saḥ satta māsa satta saṃvaccharāni mātukucchiyam

original: vasitvā sattadivasāni mūḷhagabbho dukkhamanubhavi. Mātukucchito nikkhamantassa tassa
analyzed: vasitvā satta divasāni mūḷhagabbhaḥ dukkham anubhavi mātu kucchitaḥ nikkhamantassa tassa

analyzed: attanā ava katena pāpa balena ahosi so kira atīte rājā hutvā attano sapatta raññā saddhiṃ

analyzed: saṅgāmentaḥ mātarā saddhim mantesi sā nagaram rundhitvā amitte gaṇhitum sakkā ati upāya

analyzed: madā asi saḥ api tassā vacanena nagaram rundhitvā sattame divase aggahesi tena pāpa kamma balena

original: bhagavantaṃ anussaritvā sukhena bhāraṃ muñci. Tuṭṭhā sā sattame divase buddhapamukhassa

original: bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ adāsi, athassā putto sattavassikakāle gehā nikkhamma satthāraṃ

original: upajjhāyena moggallānamācariyaṃ katvā pabbaji, atha so khuraggeyeva arahattaṃ patvā
analyzed: upajjhāyena moggallānam ācariyam katvā pabbaji atha saḥ arahattam patvā

original: buddhasāsanaṃ sobhesi, so pubbe katapuññānubhāvena mahāpuñño ahosi lābhīnañca aggo.

original: Athekasmiṃ samaye bhagavā revatattheraṃ dassanāya khadiravanavihāraṃ gacchanto tiṃsabhikkhusahassehi

original: saddhiṃ tiṃsayojanikaṃ chaṭṭitakantāraṃ sampāpuṇi nirūdakaṃ appabhakkhaṃ. Yebhuyyena

analyzed: devatā sīvalitthere pasannā tasmai bhagavā sīvalittheram puratas cārikam katvā

analyzed: kārāpite vihāre vasantaḥ devatāhi sajjita dānam paribhuñjantaḥ revata theram saṃpāpuṇitvā

analyzed: gata kammam niṭṭhāpetvā jetavanam āgamma lābhīnam aggaṭṭhāne tam ṭhapesi iti tena vuttam apadāne

original: Padumuttaro nāma jino, sabbadhammesu cakkhumā;
analyzed: padumuttaraḥ nāma jino sabba dhammesu cakkhumā

original: Ito satasahassamhi, kappe uppajji nāyako.
analyzed: itas sata sahassamhi kappe uppajji nāyako

analyzed: sīlam tassa asaṅkhyeyyam vaji rūpamaḥ vaji rūpamā itikatthaci

original: Asaṃkhiyaṃ ñāṇavaraṃ, vimutti ca anopamā.
analyzed: asaṃkhiyam ñāṇa varam vimutti ca anopamā

original: Manujāmaranāgānaṃ, brahmānañca samāgame;
analyzed: brahmānam ca samāgame

original: Samaṇabrāhmaṇākiṇṇe, dhammaṃ deseti nāyako.
analyzed: samaṇa brāhmaṇa ākiṇṇe dhammam deseti nāyako

original: Sasāvakaṃ mahālābhiṃ, puññavantaṃ jutindharaṃ,
analyzed: sa sāvakam mahā lābhim puññavantam jutindharam

original: Ṭhapesi etadaggamhi, parisāsu visārado.
analyzed: ṭhapesi parisāsu visāradaḥ

original: Tadāhaṃ khattiyo āsiṃ, pure haṃsavatīvhaye haṃsāvatavhaye itisabbattha;
analyzed: tadā aham khattiyaḥ āsim pure haṃsavatīvhaye haṃsāvatavhaye iti sabbattha

original: Sutvā jinassa taṃ vākyaṃ, sāvakassa guṇaṃ bahuṃ.

original: Nimantayitvā sattāhaṃ, bhojayitvā sasāvakaṃ;
analyzed: nimantayitvā sattāham bhojayitvā sa sāvakam

original: Mahādānaṃ daditvāna, taṃ ṭhānamabhipatthayiṃ.
analyzed: mahā dānam daditvāna tam ṭhānam abhipatthayim

original: Tadā maṃ vinataṃ pāde, disvāna purisāsabho;
analyzed: tadā mam vinatam pāde disvāna purisa āsabhaḥ

original: So sarena mahāvīro, imaṃ vacanamabravī.
analyzed: saḥ sarena mahāvīraḥ imam vacanam abravīt

original: Tato jinassa vacanaṃ, sotukāmā mahājanā;

analyzed: deva dānava gandhabbāḥ brahmāno ca mahiddhikā

original: Samaṇabrāhmaṇā cāpi, namassisuṃ katañjalī;

analyzed: namaḥ te purisājañña namaḥ te purisuttama

analyzed: sotu kāmā phalam tassa byākarohi mahā mune

analyzed: tatas avoca bhagavā suṇotha mama bhāsitam

analyzed: appameyyamhi buddhasmin guṇamhi su patiṭṭhitā

original: Satasahassito kappe, okkākakulasambhavo;

original: Sahassamatte pacceka, nāyake ca nimantiya;
analyzed: sahassamatte pacceka nāyake ca nimantiya

original: Madhurenannapānena, santappesiṃtadādaro.
analyzed: madhurena anna pānena

original: Tato cuto chakāmagge, anubhosiṃmahāyasaṃ;

original: Devaccharāparivuto, pāsāde ratanāmaye.

original: Tadāhaṃ bandhumatiyā, kulassaññatarassa ca;

analyzed: pariveṇam akāresi mahantam miti vissutam

original: Sahassampi ca datvāna, na latiṃsu ca taṃ dvayaṃ;

original: Tena kammena sukatena, cetanāpaṇidhīhi ca;

analyzed: mahāsena vaggo

analyzed: dhamma rājā saḥ pana pitu pitāmaha ādīnam dhana rāsim oloketvā ime imam sāpateyyam pahāya

original: ṭhapetvā upacāraṃ katvā amhākaṃ idañcidañca dethāti abbhukkiriṃsu. Atha te maṇiratanānubhāvena
analyzed: ṭhapetvā upacāram katvā amhākam idam cidam ca detha ati atha te maṇi ratana anubhāvena

original: gehadvāre mahantaṃ maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā vitānādinā maṇḍapaṃ alaṅkaritvā bhikkhūnaṃ āsanāni
analyzed: geha dvāre mahantam maṇḍapam kāretvā vitāna ādinā maṇḍapam alaṅkaritvā bhikkhūnam āsanāni

original: paññāpetvā te saṭṭhimatte bhikkhū nisīdāpetvā mahādānaṃ adaṃsu. Tato nagaravāsino
analyzed: paññāpetvā te saṭṭhimatte bhikkhū nisīdāpetvā mahādānam adaṃsu tatas nagara vāsinaḥ

original: maṇiratanānubhāvaṃ sutvā sannipatiṃsu. Atha te tesaṃ majjhe attano saddhābalena maṇiratanassa
analyzed: maṇi ratana anubhāvam sutvā sannipatiṃsu atha te tesam majjhe saddhā balena maṇi ratanassa

original: lābhaṃ pakāsetvā imañhi dānatthāyeva pariccajjāmāti ekasmiṃ ṭhāne patiṭṭhāpetvā tenānubhāvena
analyzed: lābham pakāsetvā iman hi dāna atthāya iva pariccajjāma iti ekasmin ṭhāne patiṭṭhāpetvā tena anubhāvena

original: yāvajīvaṃ dānaṃ dadantā sīlaṃ rakkhantā āyupariyosāne devaloke nibbattiṃsūti.
analyzed: yāvajīvam dānam dadantā sīlam rakkhantā āyu pariyosāne deva loke nibbattiṃsūti

original: Chetvāna pemaṃ api atrajesu,
analyzed: api atrajesu

original: Dadanti dānaṃ idha mānusevaṃ;
analyzed: dadanti dānam mānu sevam

original: Na dadāti ko nāma naro samiddho,
analyzed: na dadāti kaḥ nāma naraḥ samiddhaḥ

original: Dānañhi dānassa phalaṃ sarantoti.
analyzed: dānam hi dānassa phalam sarantaḥ iti

original: Puttavatthuṃ sattamaṃ.
analyzed: puttavatthum sattamam

original: 38. Tebhātikamadhuvāṇijakānaṃ vatthumhi ayamānupubbīkathā
analyzed: tebhātika madhu vāṇijakānam vatthumhi ayam ānupubbī kathā

original: Atīte kira bārāṇasiyaṃ te bhātikā ekato hutvā madhuṃ vikkiṇantā puttadāre posenti.
analyzed: atīte kira bārāṇasiyam te bhātikāḥ ekatas hutvā madhum vikkiṇantā putta dāre posenti

original: Tato tesu eko paccantaṃ gantvā malayavāsīnaṃ malavāsīnaṃ itipikatthaci hatthato madhuṃ
analyzed: tatas tesu ekaḥ paccantam gantvā malaya vāsīnam mala vāsīnam hatthataḥ madhum

original: kiṇitvā vakkiṇitvā itisabbattha gaṇhāti, eko gahitagahitamadhuṃ nagaraṃ āharati.
analyzed: kiṇitvā vakkiṇitvā iti sabbattha gaṇhāti ekaḥ gahita gahita madhum nagaram āharati

original: Eko tena āhaṭāhaṭamadhūni bārāṇasiyaṃ nisīditvā vikkiṇāti. Tasmiṃ samaye gandhamādanapabbate
analyzed: ekaḥ tena āhaṭa āhaṭa madhūni bārāṇasiyam nisīditvā vikkiṇāti tasmin samaye gandhamādana pabbate

original: eko paccekabuddho vaṇarogenā turo ahosi. Athaññataro paccekabuddho tassa madhunā
analyzed: ekaḥ paccekabuddhaḥ vaṇa rogena turaḥ ahosi athaññataraḥ paccekabuddho tassa madhunā

original: phāsu bhavissatīti ñatvā gandhamādanapabbateyeva ṭhito cīvaraṃ pārupitvā ākāsenā
analyzed: phāsu bhavissati iti ñatvā gandhamādana pabbateya iva ṭhitaḥ cīvaram pārupitvā

original: gantvā nagaradvāre otaritvā kattha madhuṃ labhāmīti labbhati itisabbattha olokento
analyzed: gantvā nagara dvāre otaritvā kattha madhum labhāmi iti labbhati iti sabbattha olokento

original: aṭṭhāsī, tadā tasmiṃparakule bhatiṃ katvā jīvamānā ekā ceṭikā ghaṭamādāya udakatthaṃ
analyzed: aṭṭhāsī tadā tasmin para kule bhatim katvā jīvamānā ekā ceṭikā ghaṭam ādāya udakattham

original: titthaṃ gacchantī maggā okkamma ghaṭaṃ ṭhapetvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi, tadā
analyzed: tittham gacchantī maggā okkamma ghaṭam ṭhapetvā vanditvā ekamantam aṭṭhāsi tadā

original: paccekabuddho bhaginī ettha bhikkhāya carantānaṃ katarasmiṃ ṭhāne madhu labbhatīti
analyzed: paccekabuddhaḥ bhaginī ettha bhikkhāya carantānam katarasmin ṭhāne madhu labbhati iti

original: pucchi. Sā tassa kathaṃ sutvā madhuāpaṇassa paññāyanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā hatthaṃ pasāretvā
analyzed: pucchi sā tassa katham sutvā madhuāpaṇassa paññāyana ṭṭhāne ṭhatvā hattham pasāretvā

original: esa bhante madhuāpaṇoti dassetvā yajjāyaṃ paccekabuddho āpaṇato madhuṃ na labhati.
analyzed: esa bhante madhuāpaṇaḥ ti dassetvā yat jāyam paccekabuddhaḥ āpaṇataḥ madhum na labhati

original: Mama nivatthavatthakaṃ datvāpi madhuṃ dassāmīti cintetvā olokentī tattheva aṭṭhāsi,
analyzed: mama nivattha vatthakam da tvā api madhum dassāmi iti cintetvā olokentī tattha iva aṭṭhāsi

original: atha paccekabuddho anupubbena vicaranto caranto itipikatthaci madhuāpaṇaṃ sampāpuṇi,
analyzed: atha paccekabuddhaḥ anupubbena vicarantaḥ carantaḥ madhuāpaṇam sampāpuṇi

original: tato kuṭimbiko kuṭimba ko itipikatthaci taṃ disvā hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā ādhārake
analyzed: tatas kuṭimbikaḥ kuṭimba ko tam disvā hatthataḥ pattam gahetvā ādhārake

original: ṭhapetvā madhughaṭaṃ ādāya pattassa upanāmento sahasā nikkujji. Tato madhu pattaṃ
analyzed: ṭhapetvā madhu ghaṭaṃ ādāya pattassa upanāmento sahasā nikkujji tatas madhu pattaṃ

original: pūretvā uttaranto puna bhūmiyaṃ pagghari. Taṃ disvā somanasso vāṇijo evaṃ patthanamakāsi.
analyzed: pūretvā uttarantaḥ puna bhūmiyam pagghari tam disvā somanassaḥ vāṇijaḥ evam patthanam akāsi

original: Vuttañhi mahāvaṃse.
analyzed: vuttam hi mahāvaṃse

original: Tattha pattassa buddhassa, vāṇijo so pasādavā;
analyzed: tattha pattassa buddhassa vāṇijaḥ saḥ pasādavā

original: Vissandayanto mukhato, pattapūraṃ madhuṃ adā.
analyzed: vissandayantaḥ mukhataḥ patta pūram madhum adāḥ

original: Puṇṇañca uppatītañca, patitañca mahītale;
analyzed: puṇṇam ca uppatītam ca patitam ca mahī tale

original: Disvā madhuṃ pasanno so, evaṃ paṇidahī tadā.
analyzed: disvā madhum pasannaḥ saḥ evam paṇidahī tadā

original: Jambudīpe ekarajjaṃ, dānenānena hotu me;
analyzed: jambudīpe eka rajjam dānena anena hotu me

original: Ākāse yojane āṇā, bhūmiyaṃ yojanepiti.
analyzed: ākāse yojane bhūmiyam

original: Evañca pana vatvā pattaṃ adāsi, paccekabuddho pattaṃ paṭiggahetvā tattheva ṭhito.
analyzed: evam ca pana vatvā pattam adāsi paccekabuddhaḥ pattam paṭiggahetvā tattha eva ṭhitaḥ

original: Icchitaṃ patthitaṃ tuyhaṃ, khippameva samijjhatu;
analyzed: icchitam patthitam tuyham khippam eva samijjhatu

original: Pūrentu citthasaṃkappā, cando paṇṇaraso yathā.
analyzed: pūrentu cittha saṃkappā cando paṇṇa rasaḥ yathā

original: Icchitaṃ patthitaṃ tuyhaṃ, sabbameva samijjhatu;
analyzed: icchitam patthitam tuyham sabbam eva samijjhatu

original: Pūrentu cittasaṃkappā, maṇijotiraso yathāti.
analyzed: pūrentu citta saṃkappāḥ maṇi joti rasaḥ yathā ati

original: Vatvā maṅgalaṃ vaḍḍhetvā agamāsi. Athantarāmagge ṭhitā ghaṭaceṭikā paccekabuddhābhimukhaṃ
analyzed: vatvā maṅgalam vaḍḍhetvā agamāsi athantarā magge ṭhitā ghaṭa ceṭikā paccekabuddha abhimukham

original: gantvā madhuṃ labhittha bhanteti pucchi. Tena laddhaṃ bhaginīti vutte kiṃ vatvā so
analyzed: gantvā madhum labhittha bhante iti pucchi tena laddham bhagini iti vutte kim vatvā so

original: adāsīti pucchi. Paccekabuddho sabbaṃ kathesi. Sā taṃ sutvā thokaṃ bhante idheva hotha
analyzed: adāsi iti pucchi paccekabuddhaḥ sabbam kathesi sā tam sutvā thokam bhante idha iva hotha

original: dāsiyā anuggahatthāyāti sīghaṃ gehaṃ gantvā nivatthapiḷotikā attano sāṭakaṃ dhovitvā
analyzed: dāsiyāḥ anuggaha tthāya ati sīgham geham gantvā nivattha piḷotikā attanaḥ sāṭakam dhovitvā

original: āharitvā cumbaṭakaṃ katvā paccekabuddhassa adāsi, yadā so bhante madhudāyako sakalajambudīpe
analyzed: āharitvā cumbaṭakam katvā paccekabuddhassa adāsi yadā saḥ bhante madhudāyakaḥ sakala jambudīpe

original: ekarajjaṃ kāreti. Tadāhaṃ tassa aggamahesī bhaveyyaṃti vatvā patthanaṃ karontīevamāha.
analyzed: eka rajjam kāreti tadā aham tassa agga mahesī bhaveyyaṃ ti vatvā patthanam karontī evam āha

original: Yadā te madhudo bhante, bhūbhujo hoti bhūtale;
analyzed: yadā te madhu daḥ bhante bhūbhujaḥ bhū tale

original: Tassa hessaṃ tadā bhante, piyā aggamahesikā.
analyzed: tassa hessam tadā bhante piyā agga mahesikā

original: Surūpāca suvāṇīca, suyasā subbatā subhā;
analyzed: surūpā ca suvāṇī ca suyasā subbatā subhā

original: Assaṃ tassa piyācātha, manāpā icchadā icchidā itipikatthaci sadāti.
analyzed: assam tassa manāpā icchadāḥ icchidāḥ itipikatthaci sadāti

original: Tassāpi tadā paccekabuddho tatheva hotūti maṅgalaṃ vatvā ākāsena gandhamādanameva
analyzed: tassa api tadā paccekabuddhaḥ tathā iva hotu uti maṅgalam vatvā ākāsena gandhamādanam eva

original: agamāsi, athāparabhāge te tayopi ekato hutvā madhulokanaṃ karontā taṃ madhughaṭaṃ
analyzed: agamāsi atha apara bhāge te tayā upi ekatas hutvā madhu lokanam karontā tam madhu ghaṭam

original: kuhiṃti pucchiṃsu, so tenattanā katakammaṃ vatvā sace tumhe tasmiṃ pattiṃ anumodeyyātha,
analyzed: kuhiṃti saḥ tenattanā kata kammam vatvā sace tumhe tasmin pattim anumodeyyātha

original: taṃ sādhu. No ce. Madhuagghanakaṃ mama hatthato gaṇhathāti vatvā tehi tato na no
analyzed: tam sādhu no ce madhuagghanakam mama hatthataḥ gaṇhatha ati vatvā tehi tatas na no

original: attho nanohattho itisabbattha madhunā, kīdisassetaṃ adāsīti vutte taṃ sutvā itaro
analyzed: atthaḥ iti sabbattha madhunā kīdisassa etam adāsi iti vutte tam sutvā itaraḥ

original: paccekabuddhā nāme te gandhamādane vasanti kāsāvaṃ pārupitvā kule kule bhikkhaṃ caranti,
analyzed: paccekabuddhāḥ nāma te gandhamādane vasanti kāsāvam pārupitvā kule kule bhikkham caranti

original: santo ete sīlavantāti kathesi, atha tesu jeṭṭho brāhmaṇacaṇḍālakāpi kāsāvaṃ paridahitvā
analyzed: santaḥ ete sīlavantā ati kathesi atha tesu jeṭṭhaḥ kāsāvam paridahitvā

original: caranti. Nūnāyaṃ caṇḍālakoti maññāmīti āha, majjhimo kujjhitvā tava paccekabuddhaṃ

original: parasamudde khipāhīti avoca, atha tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā madhudāyako mā bho tumhe ariyānaṃ
analyzed: para samudde khipāhi iti avoca atha tesam katham sutvā madhudāyakaḥ mā bho tumhe ariyānam

original: mahesakkhānaṃ mahānubhāvānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ pharusaṃ kathetha. Nirayadukkhā na
analyzed: mahesakkhānam mahā anubhāvānam paccekabuddhānam pharusam kathetha niraya dukkhāḥ na

original: bhāyathātiādinā anekā kārena nivāretvā tesaṃ guṇaṃ pakāsesi, taṃ sutvā te ubhopi
analyzed: nivāretvā tesam guṇam pakāsesi tam sutvā te ubhaḥ api

original: sādhūti pasannācittā anumodiṃsu, aparabhāge te kālaṃ katvā devamanussesu saṃsarantā

original: accayena attano attano sampattaṭṭhāne nibbattiṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ.
analyzed: accayena attanaḥ attanaḥ sampatta ṭṭhāne nibbattiṃsu tena vuttam

original: Asoko madhudo sandhi, mittādevī tu ceṭikā;
analyzed: asokaḥ madhudaḥ sandhi mittādevī tu ceṭikā

original: Caṇḍālavādī nigrodho, tisso so pāravādikoti.
analyzed: caṇḍāla vādī nigrodhaḥ saḥ pāravādiko ti

original: Tesu caṇḍālavādī jeṭṭhavāṇijo bindusārarañño jeṭṭhaputtassa sumanarājakumārassa putto

original: attanā laddhaṃ ujjeniyā rajjaṃ pahāya āgantvā sabbanagaraṃ attano hatthagataṃ katvā
analyzed: attanā laddham ujjeniyā rajjam pahāya āgantvā sabba nagaram attanaḥ hattha gatam katvā

original: sumanarājakumāraṃ aggahesi. Taṃ divasameva sumanassa rājakumārassa sumanā nāma devī
analyzed: sumana rāja kumāram aggahesi tam divasam eva sumanassa rāja kumārassa sumanā nāma devī

original: paripuṇṇagabbhā ahosi. Sā aññātakavesena nikkhamitvā avidūre aññataraṃ caṇḍālagāmaṃ

original: sandhāya gacchantī jeṭṭhakacaṇḍālassa gehato avidūre nigrodho atthi, tasmiṃ rukkhe
analyzed: sandhāya gacchantī jeṭṭhaka caṇḍālassa gehataḥ avidūre nigrodhaḥ atthi tasmin rukkhe

original: adhivatthāya devatāya ito ehi sumaneti vadantiyā saddaṃ sutvā tassā samīpaṃ gatā,
analyzed: adhivatthāya devatāya itas ehi sumana iti vadantiyā saddam sutvā tassā samīpam gatā

original: devatā attano ānubhāvena ekaṃ sālaṃ nimmiṇitvā ettha vasāhīti pādāsi. Sā taṃ sālaṃ
