original: pāvisi, gatadivaseyeva sā puttaṃ vijāyi. Sā tassa nigrodhadevatāya pariggahitattā
analyzed: pāvisi gata divaseya iva sā puttam sā tassa nigrodha devatāya pariggahita ttā

original: nigrodhotveva nāmaṃ akāsi. Jeṭṭhakacaṇḍālo diṭṭhadivasatoppabhuti taṃ attano sāmidhītaraṃ
analyzed: nigrodhaḥ tu eva nāmam akāsi jeṭṭhaka caṇḍālaḥ tam sāmidhītaram

original: viya maññamāno nibaddhavattaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Rājadhītā tattha sattavassāni vasi, nigrodhakumāropi
analyzed: viya maññamānaḥ nibaddha vattam paṭṭhapesi rāja dhītā tattha satta vassāni vasi nigrodha kumāraḥ api

original: sattavassiko jāto, tadā mahāvaruṇatthero nāma eko arahā dārakassa hetusampadaṃ disvā
analyzed: satta vassikaḥ jātaḥ tadā mahāvaruṇa theraḥ nāma ekaḥ arahā dārakassa hetu sampadam disvā

original: viharamāno sattavassiko dāni dārako. Kālo naṃ pabbājetuṃti cintetvā rājadhītāya ārocāpetvā
analyzed: viharamāno sattavassikaḥ dāni dārakaḥ kālaḥ nam pabbājetuṃ ti cintetvā rājadhītāya ārocāpetvā

original: nigrodhakumāraṃ pabbājesi, kumāro khuraggeyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ mahāvaṃse.
analyzed: nigrodha kumāram pabbājesi kumāraḥ arahattam pāpuṇi tena vuttam mahāvaṃse

original: Taṃ mahāvaruṇo thero, tadā disvā kumārakaṃ;
analyzed: tam mahāvaruṇaḥ theraḥ tadā disvā kumārakam

original: Upanissayasampannaṃ, arahā pucchi mātaraṃ;
analyzed: upanissaya sampannam arahā pucchi mātaram

original: Pabbājesi khuragge so, arahattamapāpuṇīti.
analyzed: pabbājesi khuragge saḥ arahattam apāpuṇi iti

original: So kira ekadivasaṃ pātova sarīraṃ paṭijaggitvā ācariyupajjhāyavattaṃ katvā pattacīvara
analyzed: saḥ kira eka divasam pātova sarīram paṭijaggitvā ācariya upajjhāya vattam katvā patta cīvara

original: mādāya mātuupāsikāya gehadvāraṃ gacchāmīti nikkhami. Mātunivāsaṭṭhānañcassa dakkhiṇadvārena
analyzed: mā ādāya mātu upāsikāya geha dvāram gacchāmi iti nikkhami mātu nivāsa ṭṭhānam ca assa dakkhiṇa dvārena

original: nagaraṃ pavisitvā nagaramajjhena gantvā pācīnadvārena nikkhamitvā gantabbaṃ hoti.
analyzed: nagaram pavisitvā nagara majjhena gantvā pācīna dvārena nikkhamitvā gantabbam hoti

original: Tena ca samayena asoko dhammarājā pācīnadisābhimukho sīhapañjare caṅkamati. Taṃ khaṇaṃyeva
analyzed: tena ca samayena asokaḥ dhamma rājā pācīna disā abhimukhaḥ sīha pañjare caṅkamati tam

original: nigrodho rājaṅgaṇaṃ sampāpuṇi santindriyo santamānaso yugamattaṃ pekkhamāno, tena
analyzed: nigrodhaḥ rājaṅgaṇam sampāpuṇi santindriyaḥ santa mānasaḥ yuga mattam pekkhamāno tena

original: vuttaṃ ekadivasaṃ sīhapañjare ṭhito addasa nigrodhaṃ sāmaṇeraṃ rājaṅgaṇena gacchantaṃ
analyzed: vuttam eka divasam sīha pañjare ṭhitaḥ addasa nigrodham sāmaṇeram rājaṅgaṇena gacchantam

original: dantaṃ guttaṃ santindriyaṃ iriyāpathasampannanti. Disvā panassa etadahosi. Ayaṃ jano
analyzed: dantam guttam santi indriyam iriyāpatha sampannanti disvā panassa etat ahosi ayam jano

original: sabbopi vikkhittacitto bhantamigapaṭibhāgo. Ayaṃ pana daharako avikkhitto ativiyassa
analyzed: sabbaḥ api vikkhitta cittaḥ bhanta miga paṭibhāgaḥ ayam pana daharakaḥ avikkhittaḥ ativiyassa

original: ālokitavilokitaṃ sammiñjanapasāraṇañca sobhati. Addhā etassabbhantare lokuttaradhammo
analyzed: ālokita vilokitam sammiñjana pasāraṇam ca sobhati addhā etassa abbhantare lokuttara dhammo

original: bhavissatīti rañño saha dassaneneva sāmaṇere cittaṃ pasīdi, pemaṃ saṇṭhahi, kasmā.
analyzed: bhavissati iti rañño saha dassanena iva sāmaṇere cittam pasīdi pa imam saṇṭhahi kasmā

original: Pubbe kira puññakaraṇakāle rañño jeṭṭhakabhātā vāṇijakoyaṃ.
analyzed: pubbe kira puñña karaṇa kāle raññaḥ jeṭṭhaka bhātā vāṇijakaḥ ayam

original: Pubbeva pubbena itikatthaci sannivāsena, paccuppannahitena vā;
analyzed: pubbā iva pubbena iti katthaci sannivāsena paccuppanna hitena vā

original: Evaṃ taṃ jāyate pemaṃ, uppalaṃva yathodaketi.
analyzed: evam tam jāyate uppalam va yathā udaka iti

original: Atha rājā sañjātapemo sabahumāno sāmaṇeraṃ pakkosathāti amacce pesesi, te aticirāyantīti
analyzed: atha rājā sañjāta pemaḥ sa bahu mānaḥ sāmaṇeram pakkosatha ati amacce pesesi te aticirāyanti iti

original: puna dve tayo pesesi turitaṃ āgacchatūti. Sāmaṇero attano pakatiyā eva agamāsi. Rājā
analyzed: puna dve tayaḥ pesesi turitam āgacchatu uti sāmaṇeraḥ attanaḥ pakatiyā eva agamāsi rājā

original: patirūpāsanaṃ ñatvā nisīdathāti āha. So itocito ca viloketvā natthi dāni añño bhikkhūti
analyzed: pati rūpāsanam ñatvā nisīdatha ati āha saḥ itocitaḥ ca viloketvā natthi dāni aññaḥ bhikkhū ti

original: samussitasetacchattaṃ rājapallaṅkaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pattaṃ gaṇhanatthāya rañño ākāraṃ
analyzed: samussita seta chattam rāja pallaṅkam upasaṅkamitvā pattam gaṇhana atthāya raññaḥ ākāram

original: dassesi. Rājā taṃ pallaṅkasamīpaṃ gacchantaṃ eva disvā cintesi ajjeva dāni ayaṃ sāmaṇero
analyzed: dassesi rājā tam pallaṅka samīpam gacchantam eva disvā cintesi ajjā iva dāni ayam sāmaṇeraḥ

original: imassa gehassa sāmiko bhavissatīti, sāmaṇero rañño hatthe pattaṃ datvā pallaṅkaṃ
analyzed: imassa gehassa sāmikaḥ bhavissati iti sāmaṇeraḥ raññaḥ hatthe pattam da tvā pallaṅkam

original: abhiruhitvā nisīdi. Rājā attano atthāya sampāditaṃ sabbaṃ yāgukhajjakabhattavikatiṃ
analyzed: abhiruhitvā nisīdi rājā attanaḥ atthāya sampāditam sabbam yāgu khajjaka bhatta vikatim

original: upanāmesi. Sāmaṇero attano yāpanamattameva sampaṭicchi. Bhattakiccāvasāne rājā āha
analyzed: upanāmesi sāmaṇeraḥ attanaḥ yāpanam attam eva sampaṭicchi bhatta kicca avasāne rājā āha

original: satthārā tumhākaṃ dinnaovādaṃ jānāthāti. Jānāmi mahārāja ekadesenāti. Tāta mayhampī
analyzed: satthārā tumhākam dinna ovādam jānātha ati jānāmi mahā rāja eka desena ati tāta

original: naṃ kathehīti. Sādhu mahārājāti rañño anurūpaṃ dhammapaeda appamādavaggaṃ anumodanatthāya
analyzed: nam kathehi iti sādhu mahā rāja ati raññaḥ anurūpam appamāda vaggam anumodana tthāya

original: abhāsi. Rājā pana appamādo amatapadaṃ, pamādo maccuno padaṃti sutvāva aññātaṃ tāta,
analyzed: abhāsi rājā pana appamādaḥ amata padam pamādaḥ maccuno padam ti sutvā ava aññātam tāta

original: pariyosāpehīti āha. Sāmaṇero anumodanā vasāne dvattiṃsadhuvabhattāni dvittiṃsadhurabhattāni
analyzed: pariyosāpehi iti āha sāmaṇeraḥ anumodanāḥ vasāne dvattiṃsa dhuva bhattāni dvittiṃsa dhura bhattāni

original: itisabbattha labhitvā puna divase dvattiṃsabhikkhū gahetvā rājantopuraṃ pavisitvā
analyzed: iti sabbattha labhitvā puna divase dvattiṃsa bhikkhū gahetvā rājantopuram pavisitvā

original: bhattakicca makāsi. Rājā aññepi dvattiṃsabhikkhū tumhehi saddhiṃsve bhikkhaṃ gaṇhantūti
analyzed: rājā aññe api dvattiṃsa bhikkhū tumhehi saddhiṃsve bhikkham gaṇhantu uti

original: eteneva upāyena divase divase vaḍḍhāpento saṭṭhisahassānaṃ brāhmaṇaparibbājakānaṃ
analyzed: etena iva upāyena divase divase vaḍḍhāpento saṭṭhi sahassānam brāhmaṇa paribbājakānam

original: bhattaṃ upacchinditvā antonivesane saṭṭhisahassānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ niccabhattaṃ paṭṭhapesi
analyzed: bhattam upacchinditvā antonivesane saṭṭhi sahassānam bhikkhūnam niccabhattam paṭṭhapesi

original: nigrodhattheragateneva pasādena. Nigrodhattheropi rājānaṃ saparisaṃ tīsu saraṇesu
analyzed: nigrodha tthera gatena iva pasādena nigrodha ttheraḥ api rājānam sa parisam tīsu saraṇesu

original: pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā buddhasāsane pothujjanikena pasādena acalappasādaṃ katvā
analyzed: pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpetvā buddha sāsane pothujjanikena pasādena acala ppasādam katvā

original: patiṭṭhāpesi. Rājāpi asokārāmaṃ nāma mahāvihāraṃ kārāpetvā saṭṭhisahassānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
analyzed: patiṭṭhāpesi rājā api asokārāmam nāma mahā vihāram kārāpetvā saṭṭhi sahassānam bhikkhūnam

original: niccabhattaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Sakalajambudīpe caturāsītiyā nagarasahassesu caturāsītivihārasahassāni
analyzed: niccabhattam paṭṭhapesi sakala jambudīpe caturāsītiyā nagara sahassesu caturāsīti vihāra sahassāni

original: kārāpesi. Tena vuttaṃ.
analyzed: tena vuttam

original: Caṇḍālavādidosena,
analyzed: caṇḍāla vādi dosena

original: Jāto caṇḍālagāmake;
analyzed: jātaḥ caṇḍāla gāmake

original: Pattānumodanā pākā,
analyzed: patta anumodanā

original: Āse so aseso itipikatthaci hi anāsavoti.
analyzed: āse saḥ asesaḥ iti pi katthaci hi an āsavaḥ ti

original: Ayaṃ nigrodhattherassa kathānayo.
analyzed: ayam nigrodha ttherassa kathā nayaḥ

original: Madhudāyako pana vāṇijo devalokato cavitvā pupphapure rājakule uppajjitvā piyadāso nāma kumāro hutvā chattaṃ ussāpetvā sakalajambudīpe ekarajjaṃ akāsi. Kathaṃ.
analyzed: madhudāyakaḥ pana vāṇijaḥ deva lokataḥ cavitvā pupphapure rājakule uppajjitvā piyadāsaḥ nāma kumāraḥ hutvā chattam ussāpetvā sakala jambudīpe eka rajjam akāsi katham

original: Bindusārarājassa ekasataputtā ahesuṃ. Te sabbe asoko attanā saddhiṃ ekamātikaṃ tissakumāraṃ
analyzed: bindusāra rājassa eka sata puttāḥ ahesum te sabbe asokaḥ attanā saddhim eka mātikam tissa kumāram

original: ṭhapetvā ghātesi. Ghātento cattāri vassāni anabhisittova rajjaṃ kāretvā catunnaṃ
analyzed: ṭhapetvā ghātesi ghātento cattāri vassāni an abhisittaḥ uva rajjam kāretvā catunnam

original: vassānaṃ accayena tathāgatassa parinibbāṇato dvinnaṃ vassasatanaṃ upari aṭṭhārasame
analyzed: vassānam accayena tathāgatassa parinibbāṇataḥ dvinnam vassa satanam upari aṭṭhārasame

original: vasse sakalajambudīpe ekarajjābhisekaṃ pāpuṇi. Atha taṃ sakalajambudīpe caturāsītinagarasahasse
analyzed: vasse sakala jambudīpe eka rajja abhisekam pāpuṇi atha tam sakala jambudīpe catur āsīti nagara sahasse

original: rājāno āgantvā upaṭṭhahissanti. Tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavikā tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ. Eko
analyzed: rājānaḥ āgantvā upaṭṭhahissanti tiṇṇam utūnam anucchavikā tayo pāsādāḥ ahesuṃ ekaḥ

original: mahāsappiko, eko moragīvo, eko maṅgalo nāma, tesu nekanāṭakasahassaparivuto paṭivasati.
analyzed: mahāsappikaḥ ekaḥ moragīvaḥ ekaḥ maṅgalaḥ nāma tesu neka nāṭaka sahassa parivutaḥ paṭivasati

original: Yāssa madhuāpaṇaṃ dassesi, sā asandhimittā nāma devaccharaparibhāgā rājadhītā hutvā
analyzed: yāssa madhu āpaṇam dassesi sā asandhimittā nāma devacchara paribhāgā rāja dhītā hutvā

original: saṭṭhisahassānaṃ itthīnaṃ jeṭṭhikā dhammāsokarañño aggamahesī ahosi. Abhisekānantaraṃ
analyzed: saṭṭhi sahassānam itthīnam jeṭṭhikā dhammāsokaraññaḥ aggamahesī ahosi abhiseka anantaram

original: tassa imā rājiddhiyo āgatā, pathaviyā ca heṭṭhā yojanappamāṇe āṇā pavattati. Tathā
analyzed: tassa imāḥ rājiddhiyaḥ āgatāḥ pathaviyā ca heṭṭhā yojana ppamāṇe āṇā pavattati tathā

original: upari ākāse. Anotattadahato aṭṭhahi kājehi soḷasapānīyaghaṭe divase divase devatā
analyzed: upari ākāse aṭṭhahi kājehi soḷasa pānīya ghaṭe divase divase devatā

original: āharanti. Yato sāsane uppannasaddho hutvā aṭṭhaghaṭe bhikkhusaṅghassa adāsi. Dve
analyzed: āharanti yatas sāsane uppanna saddhaḥ hutvā aṭṭha ghaṭe bhikkhu saṅghassa adāsi dve

original: ghaṭe saṭṭhimattānaṃ tepiṭakabhikkhūnaṃ dve ghaṭe aggamahesiyā asandhimittāya. Cattāro
analyzed: ghaṭe tepiṭaka bhikkhūnam dve ghaṭe aggamahesiyā a sandhi mittāya cattāro

original: ghaṭe attanā paribhuñci devatā devatāevaṃ itisabbattha, eva himavantato nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: ghaṭe attanā paribhuñci devatā devatā evam iti sabbattha eva himavantataḥ nāga latā danta kaṭṭham

original: siniddhaṃ mudukaṃ rasavantaṃ divase divase āharanti, tena rañño ca mahesiyā ca soḷasannaṃ
analyzed: siniddham mudukam rasavantam divase divase āharanti tena rañño ca mahesiyā ca

original: nāṭakasahassānañca saṭṭhimattānañca bhikkhusahassānaṃ devasikaṃ dantapoṇakiccaṃ nipphajjati.
analyzed: nāṭaka sahassānam ca saṭṭhimattānam ca bhikkhu sahassānam devasikam danta poṇa kiccam nipphajjati

original: Devasikamevassa devatā agadāmalakaṃ agadaharīṭakaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇañca gandharasasampannaṃ
analyzed: devasikamevassa devatāḥ agadāmalakam agadaharīṭakam suvaṇṇa vaṇṇam ca gandha rasa sampannam

original: ambapakkaṃ āharanti. Chaddantadahato pañcavaṇṇaṃ nivāsanapārupanaṃ pītakavaṇṇaṃ hatthapuñchanakapaṭaṃ
analyzed: amba pakkam āharanti chat danta dahataḥ pañca vaṇṇam nivāsana pārupanam pītaka vaṇṇam hattha puñchanaka paṭam

original: hatthapucchanakapaṭṭaṃ itisabbattha dibbañca pānaṃ āharanti. Devasikamevassa anulepanagandhaṃ
analyzed: hattha pucchanaka paṭṭam iti sabbattha dibbam ca pānam āharanti anulepana gandham

original: pārupanatthāya asuttamayikaṃ sumanapupphapaṭaṃ mahārahañja añjanaṃ nāgabhavanato
analyzed: pārupana tthāya sumana puppha paṭam mahārahañja añjanam nāga bhavanataḥ

original: nāgarājāno āharanti. Chaddantadahatoyeva uṭṭhitassa sālino navavāhasahassani divase
analyzed: nāga rājānaḥ āharanti uṭṭhitassa sālinaḥ divase

original: divase suvā āharanti. Te mūsikā nitthusakāni karonti. Ekopi khaṇḍataṇḍulo nāhosi.
analyzed: divase āharanti te mūsikāḥ nitthusakāni karonti ekaḥ api khaṇḍa taṇḍulaḥ

original: Rañño sabbaṭṭhānesu ayameva taṇḍulo paribhogaṃ gacchati. Madhumakkhikā madhuṃ karonti.
analyzed: raññaḥ sabba ṭṭhānesu ayam eva taṇḍulo paribhogam gacchati madhumakkhikāḥ madhum karonti

original: Kammārasālāsu acchā kūṭaṃ paharanti. Karavīkasakuṇā āgantvā madhurassaraṃ vikūjentā
analyzed: kammāra sālāsu acchā kūṭam paharanti karavīka sakuṇā āgantvā madhurassaram vikūjentā

original: rañño balikammaṃ karonti. Imāhi iddhīhi samannāgato rājā ekadivasaṃ suvaṇṇasaṅkhalikabandhanaṃ
analyzed: raññaḥ bali kammam karonti imāhi iddhīhi samannāgataḥ rājā eka divasam suvaṇṇa saṅkhalika bandhanam

original: pesetvā catunnaṃ buddhānaṃ adhigatarūpadassanaṃ kappā yukaṃ mahākālanāgarājānaṃ ānayitvā
analyzed: pesetvā catunnam buddhānam adhigata rūpa dassanam kappā yukam mahākāla nāga rājānam ānayitvā

original: setacchattassa heṭṭhā mahārahe pallaṅke nisīdāpetvā anekasata vaṇṇehi jalajathalajapupphehi
analyzed: setacchattassa heṭṭhā mahārahe pallaṅke nisīdāpetvā aneka sata vaṇṇehi jalaja thalaja pupphehi

original: suvaṇṇapupphehi ca pūjaṃ katvā sabbā laṅkārapatimaṇḍitehi soḷasahi nāṭakasahassehi
analyzed: suvaṇṇa pupphehi ca pūjam katvā sabbā laṅkāra patimaṇḍitehi soḷasahi nāṭaka sahassehi

original: samantato parikkhipitvā anantañāṇassa tāva me saddhammavaracakkavattino sammāsambuddhassa
analyzed: samantataḥ parikkhipitvā ananta ñāṇassa tāva me saddhamma vara cakkavattino sammāsambuddhassa

original: sammāsambuddharūpaṃ itisabbattha rūpaṃ imesaṃ akkhīnaṃ āpāthaṃ karohīti vatvā tena
analyzed: sammāsambuddha rūpam iti sabbattha rūpam imesam akkhīnam āpātham karohi iti vatvā tena

original: nimmitaṃ sakalasarīre vippakiṇṇapuññappabhāvanibbattāsīti anubyañjanapatimaṇḍita
analyzed: nimmitam sakala sarīre vippakiṇṇa puñña ppabhāva nibbattā asi iti anubyañjana patimaṇḍita

original: dvattiṃsa mahāpurisalakkhaṇa sassirīkatāya vikacakamaluppalapuṇḍarīkapatimaṇḍitamiva
analyzed: dvattiṃsa mahā purisa lakkhaṇa sassirīkatāya vikaca kamala uppala puṇḍarīka pati maṇḍitam iva

original: salilatalaṃ tārāgaṇaraṃsijālavisaravipphuritasobhāsamujjalamiva gaganatalaṃ nīlapītalohitā
analyzed: salila talam tārā gaṇa raṃsi jāla visara vipphurita sobhā samujjalam iva gagana talam nīla pīta lohitā

original: dibhedaṃ vicittavaṇṇaraṃsivinaddhabyāmappabhāparikkhepavilāsitāya sañcyāppabhānurāgaindadhanuvijjullatāparikkhittamiva
analyzed: dibhedam vicitta vaṇṇa raṃsi vinaddha byāma ppabhā parikkhepa vilāsitāya

original: kaṇakagirisikharaṃ nānāvirāgavimalaketumālāsamujjalitacārumatthakasobhanaṃ nayanarasāyanamiva
analyzed: kaṇaka giri sikharam nānā virāga vimala ketu mālā samujjalita cāru matthaka sobhanam nayana rasāyanam iva

original: ca brahmadevamanujanāgayakkhagaṇānaṃ buddharūpaṃ passanto sattadivasāni akkhipūjaṃ
analyzed: ca brahma deva manuja nāga yakkha gaṇānam buddha rūpam passantaḥ satta divasāni akkhi pūjam

original: nāma akāsi. Rājā kira abhisekaṃ pāpuṇitvā tīṇiyeva saṃvaccharāni bāhirakapāsaṇḍaṃ
analyzed: nāma akāsi rājā kira abhisekam pāpuṇitvā tīṇi yā iva saṃvaccharāni bāhira kapāsaṇḍam

original: parigaṇhi, catutthe saṃvacchare buddhasāsane pasīdi, tassa pana pitā bindusāro brāhmaṇabhatto
analyzed: parigaṇhi catutthe saṃvacchare buddha sāsane pasīdi tassa pana pitā bindusāraḥ brāhmaṇabhatto

original: ahosi. So brāhmaṇānañca brāhmaṇajātipāsaṇḍānaṃ paṇḍaraṅgaparibbājakānañca saṭṭhisahassamattānaṃ
analyzed: ahosi saḥ brāhmaṇānam ca brāhmaṇa jāti pāsaṇḍānam paṇḍaraṅga paribbājakānam ca saṭṭhi sahassa mattānam

original: niccabhattaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Asokopi pitarā pavattitaṃ dānaṃ attano antopure antepure
analyzed: niccabhattam paṭṭhapesi asokaḥ api pitarā pavattitam dānam attanaḥ antopure antepure

original: itisabbattha tatheva dadamāno ekadivasaṃ sīhapañjare ṭhito te upasamaparibāhirena
analyzed: iti sabbattha tathā iva dadamāno eka divasam sīha pañjare te upasama pari bāhirena

original: ācārena bhuñjamāne asaṃyatindriye avinītairiyāpathe disvā cintesi, īdisaṃ dānaṃ upaparikkhitvā
analyzed: ācārena bhuñjamāne asaṃyata indriye avinīta eriyāpathe disvā cintesi īdisam dānam upaparikkhitvā

original: yuttaṭṭhāne dātuṃ vaṭṭatīti. Evaṃ cintetvā amacce āha, gacchatha bhaṇe attano attano
analyzed: yutta ṭṭhāne dātum vaṭṭati iti evam cintetvā amacce āha gacchatha bhaṇe attano attano

original: sādhusammate samaṇabrāhmaṇe antopuraṃ abhiharatha dānaṃ dassāmīti, amaccā sādhu devāti
analyzed: sādhu sammate samaṇa brāhmaṇe antopuram abhiharatha dānam dassāmi iti amaccā sādhu deva ati

original: rañño paṭissutvā te te paṇḍaraṅgaparibbājakā jīvaka nigaṇṭhādayo ānetvā ime mahārāja
analyzed: raññaḥ paṭissutvā te te paṇḍaraṅga paribbājakāḥ jīvaka nigaṇṭha ādayaḥ ānetvā ime mahā rāja

original: amhākaṃ arahantoti āhaṃsu, atha rājā antopure uccāvacāni āsanāni paññāpetvā āgacchantūti
analyzed: amhākam arahanto ti āhaṃsu atha rājā antopure uccāvacāni āsanāni paññāpetvā āgacchantu uti

original: vatvā āgatāgate āha attano anurūpe āsane nisīdathāti, ekacce bhaddapīṭhakesu ekacce
analyzed: vatvā āgata āgate āha attanaḥ anurūpe āsane nisīdatha ati ekacce bhaddapīṭhakesu ekacce

original: phalakapīṭhakesu nisīdiṃsu, taṃ disvā rājā natthi etesaṃ anto sāroti ñatvā tesaṃ
analyzed: phalaka pīṭhakesu nisīdiṃsu tam disvā rājā natthi etesam anto sāro ti ñatvā tesam

original: anurūpaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ datvā uyyojesi. Evaṃ gacchante kāle ekadivasaṃ sīhapañjare
analyzed: anurūpam khādanīya bhojanīyam da tvā uyyojesi evam gacchante kāle eka divasam sīha pañjare

original: ṭhito nigrodhasāmaṇeraṃ disvā tasmiṃ gatena pasādena buddhasāsane pasanno saṭṭhisahassamatte
analyzed: ṭhitaḥ nigrodha sāmaṇeram disvā tasmin gatena pasādena buddha sāsane pasanno saṭṭhi sahassa matte

original: pāsaṇḍiye apanetvā saṭṭhisahassamatte bhikkhū bhojento buddhasāsane pasīditvā asokārāmaṃ
analyzed: pāsaṇḍiye apanetvā saṭṭhi sahassa matte bhikkhū bhojentaḥ buddha sāsane pasīditvā asoka ārāmam

original: kāretvā tattha te vasāpento ekadivasaṃ asokārāme saṭṭhisahassabhikkhūnaṃ dānaṃ datvā
analyzed: kāretvā tattha te vasāpentaḥ eka divasam asoka ārāme saṭṭhi sahassa bhikkhūnam dānam datvā

original: tesaṃ majjhe nisajja saṅghaṃ catūhi paccayehi pavāretvā imaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi, bhante
analyzed: tesam majjhe nisajja saṅgham catūhi paccayehi pavāretvā imam pañham pucchi bhante

original: bhagavatā desitadhammo nāma kittako hotīti, mahārāja nava aṅgāni, khandhato caturāsītidhammakkhandhasahassānīti.

original: Saṅghamittāyapi rājadhītāya ācariyāṇī āyupālattherī nāma acāriyā āyupālattherīnāma

original: sobhetvā moggaliputtatissattherassa sahāyena sahayyena. sāhāyyena. sāhayyena itipikatthaci

original: saṭṭhisahassamatte dussīle titthiye buddhasāsanā uppabbājetvā tatiyadhammasaṃgītiṃ
analyzed: saṭṭhi sahassa matte dussīle titthiye buddha sāsanā uppabbājetvā tatiya dhammasaṃgītiṃ

original: niṭṭhāpesi. Tasmiṃ kira samāgame bhikkhubhikkhuṇiyo kittakāti kittakānīti itisabbattha, vuttañhi.
analyzed: niṭṭhāpesi tasmin kira samāgame bhikkhu bhikkhuṇiyaḥ kittakā ati kittakāni iti iti sabbattha vuttam hi

original: Tasmiṃ samāgame āsuṃ, asītibhikkhukoṭiyo;
analyzed: tasmin samāgame āsum asīti bhikkhu koṭiyaḥ

original: Ahesuṃ satasahassāni, tesu khīṇāsavā yatī.
analyzed: ahesum sata sahassāni tesu khīṇa āsavāḥ yatī

original: Navutisatasahassāni, ahū bhikkhuṇiyo tahiṃ;
analyzed: navuti sata sahassāni ahū bhikkhuṇiyaḥ tahiṃ

original: Khīṇāsavā sikkhuṇiyo, sahassaṃ āsu tāsu cāti.
analyzed: khīṇa āsavāḥ sikkhuṇiyaḥ sahassam āsu tāsu ca ati

original: Evaṃ so asoko dhammarājā sakalajambudīpe aggarājā hutvā buddhasāsanaṃ sobhento vihāsi. Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana mahāvaṃse vuttoti. Vuttañhi.
analyzed: evam saḥ asokaḥ dhamma rājā sakala jambudīpe agga rājā hutvā buddha sāsanam sobhentaḥ vihāsi ayam pana ittha saṅkhepaḥ vitthāraḥ pana mahā vaṃse vuttaḥ ti vuttam hi

original: Sampuṇṇattā ayaṃ tisso, cetanāyo madhuppado;
analyzed: sampuṇṇattā ayam tissaḥ cetanāyaḥ madhuppadaḥ

original: Sabbattha sabbadā sabba, sampattimabhisambhuṇīti.
analyzed: sabbattha sabbadā sabba sampattim abhisambhuṇīti

original: Majjhimo pana vāṇijo attano pāravādidosena parasamudde laṅkāyaṃ nibbatti. Tassevaṃ
analyzed: majjhimaḥ pana vāṇijaḥ attanaḥ pāra vādi dosena para samudde laṅkāyam nibbatti tassa evam

original: kathāpaṭipāṭi veditabbā. Tambapaṇṇidīpe kira muṭasīvo nāma rājā saṭṭhivassāni rajjaṃ
analyzed: kathā paṭipāṭi veditabbā tambapaṇṇi dīpe kira muṭasīvaḥ nāma rājā saṭṭhi vassāni rajjam

original: kāresi, tassa puññapaññāguṇopetā aññamaññaṃ hitesino dasa puttā ahesuṃ. Dve ca dhītaro.
analyzed: kāresi tassa puñña paññā guṇa upetā aññamaññam hitesinaḥ dasa puttāḥ ahesum dve ca dhītaro

original: Sabbe te samaggā sammodamānā vasanti. Athāparasmiṃ samaye amaccā muṭasīvaraññe kālakate
analyzed: sabbe te samaggā sammodamānāḥ vasanti atha aparasmin samaye amaccāḥ muṭasīvaraññe kālakate

original: devānaṃpiyatissakumāraṃ abhisiñciṃsu, abhisekasamakālamevassa anekāni acchariyāni
analyzed: devānaṃpiya tissa kumāram abhisiñciṃsu abhiseka sama kālam eva assa anekāni acchariyāni

original: ahesuṃ. Tāni pakāsentā mahāvaṃsakathācariyā āhaṃsu.
analyzed: ahesum tāni pakāsentāḥ mahā vaṃsa kathā cariyāḥ āhaṃsu

original: Devānaṃpiyatissoti, vissuto dutiyo suto;
analyzed: devānaṃpiya tissaḥ ti vissutaḥ dutiyaḥ sutaḥ

original: Tesu ahosimuṭasīvassa, dasaputtesupuññavā itikatthaci bhātusu sabbesu, puññapaññādhiko ahu.
analyzed: tesu iti katthaci bhātusu sabbesu puñña paññā adhikaḥ ahu

original: Devānaṃpiyatisso so, rājāsi pituaccaye;
analyzed: devānaṃpiya tissaḥ saḥ rājā asi pitu accaye

original: Tassābhisekena samaṃ, bahūnacchariyānahū.
analyzed: tassa abhisekena samam

original: Laṅkādīpamhi sakale, nidhayo ratanānica;
analyzed: sakale nidhayaḥ ratanāni ca

original: Antoṭhitāni uggantvā, pathavītalamāruhuṃ.
analyzed: antoṭhitāni uggantvā pathavī talam āruhum

original: Laṅkādīpasamīpamhi, bhinnanāvā gatāni ca;
analyzed: laṅkā dīpa samīpamhi bhinna nāvā gatāni ca

original: Tatra jātāni ca thalaṃ, ratanāni samāruhuṃ.
analyzed: tatra jātāni ca thalam ratanāni

original: Chātapabbatapādamhi, tisso ca veḷuyaṭṭhiyo;
analyzed: chāta pabbata pādamhi tissaḥ ca veḷuyaṭṭhiyaḥ

original: Jātā rathapatodena, samānā parimāṇato.
analyzed: jātā ratha patodena samānā parimāṇataḥ

original: Tāsu ekā latāyaṭṭhi, rajatābhā tahiṃ latā;
analyzed: tāsu ekā rajata ābhā tahim latā

original: Suvaṇṇavaṇṇā rucirā; Dissantetā manoramā.
analyzed: suvaṇṇa vaṇṇā rucirā manoramā

original: Ekā kusumayaṭṭhītu; Kusumāni tahiṃpana;
analyzed: ekā kusumāni

original: Nānāni nānāvaṇṇāni; Dissantetiphuṭāni ca.
